Lado K'iche'

— 1r — cap. __LB__1.del serde Could have a cross followed by 'sexde' __LB__Díos ✎__LB__ARE V XE OHER __LB__Ꜩih varal Quiche vbi.

__LB__Varal xchicaꜩibah vi xchica__PC__ 1. __LB__tiquiba vi oher ꜩih, vticaribal, __LB__vxenabal puch ronohel xban, __LB__pa tinamit quiche, ramac qui__PC__ __LB__che vinac; arecut xchicacam __LB__vi vcutunizaxic, vcalahobiza__PC__ __LB__xic, vꜩihoxic puch euaxibal __LB__zaquiribal rumal ꜩacol bitol __LB__alom, qaholom quibi hun ah__PC__ __LB__pu vuch, hun ahpu vtiu, za__PC__ __LB__quinimac ꜩÿz, tepeu, qucumaꜩ __LB__vqux cho, vqux palo, ah ra__PC__ __LB__xalaꜫ, ah raxaꜩel chu qha__PC__ __LB__xic, rachbixic, rachꜩihoxic __LB__rÿ iyom, mamom xpiyacoc, __LB__xmucane vbi, maꜩanel chu__PC__ __LB__quenel camul yiom, camul __LB__mamom chuqhaxic pa quiche 2 ✎__LB__ꜩih. ta xquiꜩihoh ronohel __LB__ruq xquiban chic chizaquil __LB__qolem, zaquil ꜩih vae xchi__PC__ __LB__caꜩibah chupan chic vqha__PC__ __LB__bal Dios pa christianoil chic __LB__xchiquelezah rumal maha__PC__ __LB__bi chic ilbal re popo vvh. il__PC__ __LB__bal zac petenac chaca palo. __LB__vꜩihoxic camuhibal ilbal zac__PC__ __LB__qazlem chuqhaxic. qo nabe __LB__vuhil, oher ꜩibam puch xa __LB__eval vvach ilol re, bizol re, __LB__nim vpeoxic, vꜩihoxic puch, __LB__ta chiquiz ꜩuk ronohel cah 3.__LB__prover.__LB__Cap. 8. __LB__vleu, vcah ꜩucuxic, vcah __LB__xucutaxic retaxic, vcah __LB__cheexic, vmeh camaxic, vyuc__PC__ __LB__camaxic vpa cah, vpa vleu __LB__cah ꜩuc, cah xu cut chuqha__PC__ __LB__xic rumal ri ꜩacol bitol __LB__vchuch, vcahau qazlem vi__PC__ __LB__naquirem, abanel, quxla__PC__ __LB__nel, alay rech, quxlaay __LB__rech zaquil amaquil, za__PC__ __LB__quil al, zaquil qahol, ah__PC__ __LB__biz, ahnaoh chirech ronohel — 1v — ✎__LB__ato qol vi cah vleu cho palo __LB__

__LB__ARE V ꜨIHOXIC VAE __LB__Cacaꜩinin oc, caca chamam oc __LB__caꜩinonic cacazilanic, caca __LB__lolinic, catolona puch v __LB__pa cah.

__LB__Vae cute nabe ꜩih nabe vch__PC__ __LB__an. mahabi oꜫ hun vinac, hun __LB__chicop, ꜩiquin, car, tap, che __LB__abah, hul, zivan, quim, qui__PC__ __LB__chelah; xa v tu quel cah qolic. __LB__maui calah v vach vleu; xa __LB__vtuquel remanic palo vpa__PC__ __LB__cah, ronohel, mahabi na quila __LB__camolobic, cacoꜩobic, hun ta __LB__cazilobic camal cabantah, ca __LB__coꜩ cabantah pa cah. xma qo __LB__vinaquila qolic, yacalic; xa __LB__remanic ha, xa lianic palo, xa __LB__vtuquel remanic, xma qo vi na ✎__LB__quilalo qolic; xa cachamanic __LB__caꜩininic chi queꜫum, chi aꜫab, __LB__xa vtuquel ri ꜩacol, bitol, te__PC__ __LB__peu, gucumaꜩ e alom, e qaho__PC__ __LB__lom qo pa ha zactetoh e qovi __LB__e mucutal pa cuc, pa raxon __LB__are vbinaam viri gucumaꜩ __LB__e nimac etamanel, e nimac ah__PC__ __LB__naoh chiqui qoheic; quehe __LB__cut xax qo vi ri cah qonaipu__PC__ __LB__ch vqux cah are vbi ri ca__PC__ __LB__bauil chuqhaxic.

__LB__Ta xpe cut vꜩih varal xul __LB__cuq ri tepeu gucumaꜩ varal __LB__chi quecumal chi aꜫabal xqh__PC__ __LB__au ruq ri tepeu gucumaꜩ, xe __LB__qha cut, ta xenaohinic, ta xe __LB__bizonic, xerico quib, xquicuch __LB__qui ꜩih, qui naoh, ta xcalah __LB__ta xquiquxlaah quib .+ zac taxevi __LB__xcalah puch vinac, ta xqui__PC__ __LB__naohih v ꜩuquic v vinaqui__PC__ __LB__ric che, caam, v ꜩucuquic pu__PC__ __LB__ch qazlem vinaquirem chi __LB__queꜫumal, chi aꜫabal, rumal __LB__ri vqux cah huracan vbi, — 2r — __LB__caculha huracan nabe, vcab __LB__cut chipa caculha, roxchic __LB__raxa caculha chi e cu oxib __LB__rÿ vqux cah ta xeul cuq ri __LB__tepeu gucumaꜩ, ta xnaohi__PC__ __LB__xic zac qazlem, hupacha ta cha __LB__uaxoc ta caquiro puch, apa__PC__ __LB__chinac ꜩucul cool ta chuxoc __LB__quixnohintah. areri ha chel __LB__tah chihamatah, chivinaquir __LB__va vleu vlaquel ta curib cha__PC__ __LB__ta cut, ta chauaxoc ta zaquiroc, __LB__cah vleu, ma ta cut v quihila__PC__ __LB__bal vcalaibal rÿ caꜩac ca__PC__ __LB__bit ta vinaquiroc vinac ꜩac __LB__vinac bit xeqha cut ta xvi__PC__ __LB__naquir cu ri vleu cumal; xa__PC__ __LB__quiꜩih xqohe vi v vinaqui__PC__ __LB__ric chivinaquir vleu, vleuh __LB__xecha libah chi xvinaquiric; __LB__queheri xa ꜩuꜩ xa mayui v __LB__vinaquiric chic u pupuheic __LB__ta xtape pa ha ri huiub hu__PC__ __LB__zuc nimac huyub xuxic xa__PC__ ✎__LB__qui naual xa qui puz xbana__PC__ __LB__tah vi vnaohixic huyub ta__PC__ __LB__cah, huzuc rach vinaquiric __LB__v quizizil, v pachahil v vach. __LB__quehe cut xquicot vi ri qu__PC__ __LB__cumaꜩ, vꜩ mi xatulic at vqux __LB__cah, at huracan, at pu chipi__PC__ __LB__caculha, raxa caculha, xchu__PC__ __LB__ꜩinic caꜩac cabit xeqha cut. __LB__nabe cut xvinaquir vleuh __LB__huyub tacah, xchobochox vbe __LB__ha xbiniheic colehe racan __LB__xol tac huyub, xa chobol chic __LB__xeqohe vi ha, ta xcutunihe__PC__ __LB__ic nimac huyub. quehe cut __LB__v vinaquiric vlew ri ta xvi__PC__ __LB__naquiric cumal ri vqu x cah __LB__vqux vleu quevchaxic rÿ __LB__cute nabe xquinohih xcolo __LB__vi ri cah, xcolo nai puch v__PC__ __LB__leuh chupan ha. quehe cut __LB__vnaohixic ri ta xquinohih ta __LB__xquibizoh ruꜩinic vbana — 2v — __LB__tahic cumal.

2 __LB__Ta xquinohih chic vchicop__PC__ __LB__il huyub chahal re quichelah __LB__ronohel, vvinaquil huyub ri __LB__quieh, ꜩiquin, qoh, balam, cu__PC__ __LB__maꜩ, zochoh, canti chahal ca__PC__ __LB__am cacha ri alom, qaholom __LB__xa pa chilolinic, maxa on chi__PC__ __LB__ꜩininic vxeche, caam, cate vꜩ __LB__chiqohe chahal re xeqha cut __LB__ta xquinohih, xqhiꜩihoh puch __LB__huzu cu xvinaquir queh ꜩiquin __LB__ta zquizipah cut rochoch qu__PC__ __LB__eh ꜩiquin. at queh pa beyaa __LB__pa zivan catvar vi, varal cat __LB__qohe vi pa quim pa zacul, pa __LB__quechelah, quipoco vi ivib, ca__PC__ __LB__hcah ibinibal, ychacabal chu__PC__ __LB__xic xevqhaxic ta xquichic cut __LB__cochoch chuti ꜩiquin, nima __LB__ꜩiquin. ixix ꜩiquin chuvi __LB__che, chuvi caam quixochoch__PC__ __LB__in vi, quixhain vi, chiri quix__PC__ __LB__poc vi, quixquiritah vi chu e__PC__ __LB__ab che, chueab caam xevqh__PC__ __LB__axic quieh ꜩiquin taxquiba__PC__ __LB__no quibanoh ronohel xuca__PC__ __LB__mo v varabal, v yacalibal __LB__quehe cut cochoch vi chicop __LB__ri vleu xuyao alom, qaho__PC__ __LB__lom. xuꜩininaca chic ronohel __LB__ri queh ꜩiquin

__LB__Ta xevqhax chicut rÿ queh __LB__ꜩiquin rumal ꜩacol bitol a__PC__ __LB__lom, qaholom: quixqhauoc , __LB__quixziquinoc mi xyonoliqui__PC__ __LB__nic, mixziquinic, quixqha va he __LB__tah chi __LB__Xeqha qu ri huracan ruq te__PC__ __LB__peu gucumaꜩ ta xquibih chire__PC__ __LB__ch ahquih ah bit enic vachi__PC__ __LB__nel xuculu, xa pu churico che__PC__ __LB__ta chic chi cauinac bitoh, chica are ꜩucul cool ta chavax __LB__oc tazaquiroc at ixim at ꜩi__PC__ __LB__te, at quih, at bit. catchoco__PC__ __LB__nic cattaquentah xqha chi__PC__ __LB__re ixim q,ite, quih bit. cat __LB__quixla vloc at __LB__qux cah quehe cut xepah chivi __LB__xa vtihtobexic xa pu v va ba__PC__ __LB__bexic chi vinac queqhau na__PC__ __LB__bec, xa chaquih qui vach mana __LB__zonol cacan, quieab mahabi __LB__qui __LB__Catecut qui quÿzic chic qui __LB__mayxic qui cutuxic puch xe __LB__camizax chic poy aham che __LB__ta xnohix quibutic rumal vqux __LB__cah nima butic xbanic xpe __LB__pa quivi ri e poy e aham che __LB__q,ite vtiohil ri achih, ta xaha__PC__ __LB__xic, rumal ꜩacol bitol, ixoc __LB__zibac cut vtiohil ixoc. xrah The following line has two bold lines associated with it, one in the left margin, the other under the "ol" of "bitol" __LB__oquic rumal ꜩacol bitol maui __LB__xenauic, ma pu xeqhauic chu __LB__vach cah ꜩac, cah bit banol que __LB__vinaquirizay quech quehe __LB__cut qui ca mizaxic xebutic __LB__xpe nima eol chila chicah. __LB__xe cotcovach vbi, xcotin vloc __LB__vbac qui vach, xepe camaloꜩ __LB__xcupin vla quiholom, xpe __LB__coꜩbalam. xtio quitiohil, xpe __LB__tucumbalam xtucuuic xqui__PC__ __LB__chouic quibaquil, quibochil __LB__xcahixic, xmuchulixic qui ba__PC__ __LB__quil, cahizabal qui vach; ru __LB__mal maui quinauic chuvach __LB__qui chuch, chuvach puch qui __LB__cahau, ri vqux cah, huracan __LB__vbi, cumal xquecumaric v __LB__vach vleu, xticaric quecal hab __LB__quihil hab, acabal hab xoc vla __LB__chuti chicop nima chicop xcut __LB__qui vach rumal che abah. x__PC__ __LB__qhauic ronohel qui quebal__PC__ — 5r — __LB__quixot, qui lac, qui boh, qui ꜩi __LB__quieaa, haruh pala ronohel 1 __LB__xcutu qui vach cax xiban __LB__chique, xohitio ixchi cut x__PC__ __LB__quixcati chic xqhari qui ꜩi __LB__cac chiquech. re cu ri ꜫaa __LB__xohcoconic iuumal hu ta __LB__quih, hu ta quih, xquec zaqui__PC__ __LB__ric amaquel holi, holi, hu__PC__ __LB__qui, huqui ca vach ivumal __LB__are ta nabe capatan chiva__PC__ __LB__ch, ixtana vinac vaca__PC__ __LB__mic cut xchitih ca chucab __LB__xchicaqueeh, xchicahoc __LB__puch i tiohil xqhari qui __LB__ꜫaa chique. are curi qui __LB__ꜩi xqha chic ta xqhauic, na __LB__qui pa rumal maui chi__PC__ __LB__ya cava, xa cohmucunic __LB__xa pu cohicuxih vloc, coh __LB__izac pu vloc yacal vbi ca __LB__cheel ivumal ta quixva__PC__ __LB__ic xere cohivuchaah vi __LB__maui cohqhauic mata cu __LB__mi xohcamic chiue hu pa __LB__cha maui mi xixnauic __LB__xixnau ta cut chiuih ta cut __LB__xohzach vi, vacamic cut x__PC__ __LB__chitih cabac qo pa ca chi x__PC__ __LB__quixcatio xeqha ri ꜩi chi__PC__ __LB__que ta xcut qui vach. are __LB__chicuri qui xot, qui boh x__PC__ __LB__chau chic chique: cax, va xi __LB__ban chique xac ca chi, xac__PC__ __LB__ca vach; amaquel oh ꜩacal __LB__chuuicac cohicato maui cax __LB__xcanao, xchitih cut xquix __LB__caporoh xcha ri qui boh ro__PC__ __LB__nohel xcutu qui vach. areri __LB__abah ri quixcub chitaninic __LB__chipe paeae taeal chi qui__PC__ __LB__holom, cax xban chique. __LB__anilabic que mal malihab __LB__chic querah acanic chuvi __LB__ha xa chiu vlih ha queꜩac __LB__vloc, querah acan chuvi __LB__che queqhaquix vloc ruma che — 5v — __LB__querah oc pahul xa chiyuch __LB__hul chi qui vach; que he cut __LB__vcayohic vinac ꜩac vinac __LB__bit, eꜩixel, e ꜩalaꜩoxel chi __LB__vinac xmayxic, xcutuxic __LB__quichi qui vach conohel, xqha __LB__cut are retal ri qoy qo pa __LB__quechelah vacamic, are __LB__xqohe vi retal rumal xache __LB__quitiohil xcohic rumal ah__PC__ __LB__ꜩac ahbit, arecuri qoy que__PC__ __LB__heri vinac chivachinic retal __LB__hule vinac ꜩac, vinac bit __LB__xapoy, xapu ahamche.

__LB__Are cut xa hubic zac na __LB__tanoh vvachvleu mahabi __LB__quih hun cut cunimarizah __LB__rib, vvcub caquix vbi, qo __LB__nabe cah vleu, xa ca moy__PC__ __LB__mot v vach quih ic caqha __LB__curi: xaui xere vzaquetal __LB__vinac rÿ, xbutic queheri __LB__naual vinac vqoheic in __LB__nim quiqohe chic chuvi vi__PC__ Big C is actually a correctional overwrite. __LB__nac ꜩaC vinac bit in vquih __LB__in pu vzac in naipu riquil __LB__ta chuxoc, nim nu zaquil in __LB__binibal, in pu chacabal ru__PC__ __LB__mal vinac. rumal puvac __LB__vbac nuvach xa catilto__PC__ __LB__tic chi yamanic raxa cuval __LB__naypu ve raxcauacoh chi __LB__abah queheri v va cah are __LB__curi nu ꜩam zachuluhuh chi__PC__ __LB__nah queheri ic puvac cut __LB__nu calibal cazac paque v__PC__ __LB__vach vleu ta quinel vloc __LB__chuvach nu calibal quehe __LB__cut in quih vi in pu ic ru__PC__ __LB__mal zaquil al zaquil qahol __LB__ta chuxoc rumal chinah copon __LB__vi nu vach: qhari vucub ca__PC__ __LB__quix macu quiꜩih are ta quih, __LB__ri, vcub caquix xere cunima__PC__ Big C is actually and correctional overwrite __LB__rizah rib rivxic vpuvaC __LB__xere cut tocol vi v vach ri __LB__chicube vi mana ronohelta — 6r — __LB__vxecah copon vi vvach. maha __LB__cut qui quiloc v vach quih, ic __LB__chumil mahaoc cazaquiroc __LB__quehe cut cucobizah vi rib ri __LB__vucub caquix chiquihil, chi __LB__iquil xa maha chicatunoc chi__PC__ __LB__calahoboc vzaquil quih ic xa __LB__xuraih nimal icouen are ta __LB__xbanic butic cumal poy aham __LB__che quehe cut xchicabÿh chic __LB__ta xcamic vucub caquix ta __LB__xchacatahic, ta xbanatahic vi__PC__ __LB__nac rumal ahꜩac, ahbit.

__LB__Vae vxe vchacatahic v yi__PC__ __LB__coxic chi puch v quih vucub __LB__ca quix cumal e caib qaholab __LB__hun ahpu vbi hun, xbalan__PC__ __LB__que vbi vcab xavi e caba__PC__ __LB__uil rumal iꜩel xquilo ri ni__PC__ __LB__marizai rib xrah vban chu__PC__ __LB__vach vqux cah, xqha curi __LB__qaholab mavi vꜩ ta chuxoc __LB__mavi chiqaze vinac varal __LB__chuvach vleu quehe cut __LB__chicatih, v vbaxic chuvi re__PC__ __LB__cha chica v vbah vi chiri __LB__chicacoh vi viab ta quizoc __LB__v quinomal, v xit, v puvac __LB__v cual, v yamanic ri cuca__PC__ __LB__cabeh que he cut chubano __LB__ronohel vinac. maui are __LB__chivinaquir vi ꜫaꜫal ri xa __LB__puvac ta chuxoc xeqha ri __LB__qaholab huhun chi vb qui__PC__ __LB__telen qui cabichal are cu__PC__ __LB__ri vvcub caquix e caib v qa__PC__ __LB__hol are nabe al ri zipac__PC__ __LB__na, vcab al chicut ri cab__PC__ __LB__racan chimalmat cut vbi __LB__qui chuch rixoquil ri v__PC__ __LB__vcub caquix are curi zi__PC__ __LB__pacna are chirechaah ri __LB__nimac huiub. ri chicac hun __LB__ahpu pe cul ya xcanul ma__PC__ __LB__camob huliznab chuchaxic __LB__vbi huiub xqolic ta chi za__PC__ __LB__quiric xa hun aꜫab chi vi- — 6v — The number 6 in the margin is in a different hand and ink (pencil?) __LB__naquiric rumal ri zipacna 6 __LB__are ri chicuri cabracan chi__PC__ __LB__zilab huiub rumal chi ne __LB__bouic chuti huiub, nima __LB__huyub rumal, xaui quehe __LB__nimarizabal quib xquiba__PC__ __LB__no vqahol vvcub caquix __LB__ixva, in quih xqha vucub __LB__caquix inva, in banol vleu __LB__xqha ri zipacna, in chicut __LB__quiyou cah chinvlih rono__PC__ __LB__hel vleu xqhari cabracan __LB__xavi vqahol vvcub caquix __LB__xaui chiri xquicam vi qui__PC__ __LB__nimal chirih qui cahau are __LB__cut iꜩel xquil vi qaholab, __LB__maha chibantahoc canabe __LB__chuch canabe cahau quehe __LB__cut xnohix vi qui camic qui __LB__zachic cumal qaholab.

__LB__Vae cute v vbaxic vvcub __LB__caquix cumal caib qaholab __LB__xchi cabÿh qui chacatahic __LB__chi qui huhunal ri nimari__PC__ __LB__zai rib.

__LB__Are chic vchacatahic, v __LB__camic zipacna, ta xchac chic __LB__cumal ri e caib qaholab hun __LB__ahpu, xbalanque, are chic __LB__v yoe qui qux caholab ri omu__PC__ __LB__ch chi qaholab xecamic maui mi xnu__PC__ __LB__rico. cate vꜩ lo qui paqueic __LB__quinoc vbic xqha chi cut ca__PC__ __LB__te cut pacal chic ta xoc vbic __LB__xquiz cu oc vbic xa v vi vchec __LB__chic xcutun vloc xquiz __LB__holab hun ahpu xbalanque __LB__ri banol huyub xqha v ꜩiho__PC__ __LB__xic oher v nabe qahol vvc__PC__ __LB__ub caquix chuxe huyub me__PC__ __LB__auan vbi xchacatahvi xa na __LB__ual xchacatah vi. vcab nima__PC__ __LB__rizai rib. hun chi cut xchica__PC__ __LB__bÿh vbixic

__LB__Rox chicut nimarizai rib v __LB__cab v qahol vvcub caquix cab__PC__ __LB__rracan vbi in yohol huiub xqha. __LB__xaui cu xere hun ahpu xbalan__PC__ __LB__que xchacou re cabrracan, xqha__PC__ — 11r — __LB__rihuracan, chipi caculha, raxa __LB__caculha, ta xqhauic chiquech ri __LB__hun ahpu xbalanque v cab v __LB__qahol vvcub caquix hunchic __LB__hunchic chichacatahic, xavi nu __LB__ꜩih rumal __LB__Are chicut xchicabÿh chic v __LB__bi qui cahau ri hun ahpu xbalan __LB__que pxcacamuh chuvi xapu xca__PC__ __LB__camuh vbixic vꜩihoxic puch qui __LB__qaholaxic ri hun ahpu xbalanq’ __LB__xa nicah xchicabÿh, xa chacab v __LB__bixic quicahau.

__LB__Vae cute vꜩihoxic. are qui bi __LB__ri hunhunahpu, que vqhaxic are __LB__cut qui cahau ri xpiyacoc xmu__PC__ __LB__cane chiquecumal chiacabal __LB__xealaxic ri hunhunahpu, vvcub __LB__hun ahpu cumal xpiyacoc, xmu__PC__ __LB__cane are curi hunhunahpu e __LB__caib xeralcualah, e pu caib v __LB__qahol, hun baꜩ vbi nabe al, hun __LB__choven chicut vbi vcab al are __LB__cut vbi qui chuch va xbaqui__PC__ __LB__yalo chuqhaxic rixoquil hun __LB__hunahpu. __LB__Cate cut qui petic zamahel ru __LB__mal hun came, vvcub came quix __LB__bec ixrah popachih he i taca ri __LB__hun hunahpu, vvcub hun ahpu __LB__quixqha ta quixopon cuq quepe __LB__toc queqha ahauab chivech va__PC__ __LB__ral tah queul chaaha vi cuq __LB__chicacaztah ta cavach cuq qui__PC__ __LB__ꜩih cacamaihah qui chi quehe __LB__ta cut quepe vi queqha aha__PC__ __LB__uab chiquicam cu vloc ri qui __LB__choconizan, qui bate, qui pa ch__PC__ — 13v — 13 __LB__cab chipe naipuch riqui quiqque __LB__qha ahauab, quixqha ta quixopon__PC__ __LB__oc xevqhaxic ri zamahel are cut __LB__qui zamahel ri tucur, chabi tucur, __LB__huracan tucur, caquix tucur, ho__PC__ __LB__lom tucur quevqhaxic vzama__PC__ __LB__hel xibalba are ri qhabi tucur que__PC__ __LB__heri qhab. xa copquic, are curi hu__PC__ __LB__racan tucur xa hun racan qo v __LB__xic. are curi caquix tucur eae __LB__rih qo v xic, are chi naipuch ri __LB__holom tucur xa vtuquel vholom __LB__mahabi racan xa v xic qolic __LB__e cahib ri zamahel rahpop achi__PC__ __LB__hab quecalem ta xepe cut chila __LB__chi xibalba libah chi xevlic e __LB__cu tacal chuvi hom quechaah cut __LB__hun hunahpu vvcub hun ahpu __LB__pahom ri nim xob carchah chu__PC__ __LB__qhaxic e cu tacatoh ri tucur chuvi __LB__hom ta xquizac cut quiꜩih xavi __LB__xere vcholic vꜩih hun came, v__PC__ __LB__vcub came ahal puh, ahal cana __LB__chamia bac, chamia holom, xi__PC__ __LB__quiripat, cuchumaquic, ahal__PC__ __LB__mez, ahal tocob, xic patan qui__PC__ __LB__bi conohel ahauab xꜩac qui__PC__ __LB__ꜩih cumal tucur. maquiꜩih ca__PC__ __LB__qha ahau hun came, vvcub ca__PC__ __LB__me? clear paragraph distinctions in the Spanish column, but not in the K'iche', which is the reverse of the usual situation 14 __LB__ibate, ipachcab xevqhax cut __LB__quixcu vloc chi catem xev__PC__ macu calah qo chivi ri v __LB__holom hunhunahpu xahunam — 15v — 15 __LB__chic vvach ruq vvach zima carilo __LB__ronohel xibalba ta chul qui caiih. __LB__nim vqoheic riche xux chiqui qux __LB__rumal __LB__catah quib, xquiquil quib xibal__PC__ __LB__ba conohel. macu calah chiri v __LB__holom hun hunahpu xa hunama__PC__ __LB__tal chic ruc vvach che ri zima __LB__vbi xuxic, nim cut vꜩihoxic xu__PC__ __LB__ta hun capoh. va cute xchicabÿh __LB__roponic.

__LB__Va chi cute vꜩihoxic hun capoh __LB__vmeal hun ahau cuchumaquic __LB__vbi.

__LB__Are cut ta xuta hun capoh vme__PC__ __LB__al hun ahau cuchumaquic vbi v __LB__cahau xquic cut vbi ri capoh ta __LB__xuta cut vꜩihoxic ri vvach che __LB__ta chiꜩihox chic rumal vcahau __LB__chumaihah cut ta chiꜩihoxic ma __LB__qui naoh vila ri che cabixic qui__PC__ __LB__ꜩih quz vvach cacha canutao x__PC__ __LB__qha cut cate xbec xa vtuquel xa__PC__ __LB__pon cut chuxe che tiquil chipuc__PC__ __LB__bal chah tiquil vi hiiaa. naqui__PC__ __LB__pe vvach vae che maqui pa __LB__quz chivachin vache. maquicam __LB__tah maquizach tah laquita xchin __LB__chup hunoc xqha curi capoh ta __LB__xqhau cut ri bac qo vla xol che __LB__naquipa caraih chire ri xa bac __LB__ri colocoxinac chucab tac che __LB__xqha ri vholom hun ahpu ta Following note contains cursive annotation, partly crossed out, preceded by a cross sign (which needs to be represented as an entity). __PC__ __LB__Rel __LB__Pug, dap I. __LB__xqhavic chire ri capoh maca__PC__ __LB__raih xuqha xic? canuraih xqha __LB__cut ri capoh uꜩbala chaliquiba __LB__vloc ri auiquicab vilana xqha __LB__ri bac ve xqha cu capoh xuliqui__PC__ __LB__ba acanoc vviquicab chuvach __LB__bac cate cut chipiꜩ caban v __LB__chub bac ta xpetic tacal cut pu __LB__cab capoh ta xril cut v pu cab __LB__huzuc xunicoh macuhabi vchub — 16r — __LB__bac pucab xaretal mi xnuya cha__PC__ __LB__ue ri nu chub nu caxah. are ri nu __LB__holom mahabi cachocon chivi xa __LB__bac mahabi chi v chac. xavi que__PC__ __LB__he vholom ve qui nimahaU xa__PC__ __LB__vtiohil vꜩ vi vvach. are cut ta __LB__chicamic chuxibih chirib vinac __LB__rumal vbaquil. quehe cut xa __LB__vqahol quehe ri vchub vcaxah __LB__vqoheic ve vqahol ahau ve puch __LB__vqahol naol, ahuchan xma chi__PC__ __LB__zach vi chibec chiꜩacatahic ma__PC__ __LB__vi chupel mapu maixel vvach __LB__ahau achih naol, ahvqhan xa __LB__xichicanahic vmial vqahol __LB__ta chuxoc. quehe mi xnuban __LB__chave. catacan cut chila chu__PC__ __LB__vach vleu mavi cacamic catoc __LB__paꜩih ta chuxoc xqhari vho__PC__ __LB__lom hun hunahpu vvcub hun __LB__ahpu. xavi qui naoh taxquiba__PC__ __LB__no are vꜩih huracan chipica__PC__ __LB__culha, raxa caculha chiquech. __LB__quehe cu vꜩalihic chic capoh __LB__chi rochoch quia pixab xbÿx __LB__chirech. huzu cu xvinaquir ral __LB__chupam rumal ri xachub. are __LB__cut quivinaquiric hun ahpu __LB__xbalanque ta xopon cut chi ro__PC__ __LB__choch ri capoh xzacat cut va__PC__ __LB__caquib ic ta xnauachil rumal __LB__vcahau ri cuchumaquic vbi v __LB__cahau

__LB__Cate puch vnatahic capoh ru__PC__ __LB__mal vcahau ta xil ri ral cochic __LB__ta xquicuch cut qui naoh cono__PC__ __LB__hel ahauab hun came vvcub __LB__came ruc ri cuchumaquic are __LB__ri uꜩ bala __LB__quiꜩih vi chi at hoxol chec chipu__PC__ __LB__zu ix rahpop achih chicama vloc __LB__ri vqux chupan zel chiquicololeh __LB__ahauab vacamic xevqhax cuta __LB__ri tucur, e cahib ta xebec __LB__Are cut e qo ri vchuch hun baꜩ __LB__hun choven ta xul ri ixoc xquic v __LB__bi. ta xul cut ri ixoc xquic ruq __LB__ri vchuch hun baꜩ hun choven __LB__xqoloc ral chupam. xa zcaquin __LB__chic __LB__Are chic xchicaꜩihoh calaxic __LB__hun ahpu xbalanque

__LB__Are cut calaxic vae xchicabÿh __LB__ta xuric vquih calaxic taxalan __LB__puch ri capoh xquic vbi. macu xu __LB__vachih atit ta xealaxic libah __LB__chi xeyaqueic e caib chicalaxic __LB__hun ahpu xbalanque quibi pa __LB__huiub xeyaquevi taxeoc cut pa __LB__ha macu quevaric he aꜩaca vloc __LB__quiꜩih chach quichi xqha ri atit __LB__cate cut ta xeya pa zanic quz cu qui__PC__ __LB__varam chiri xeel chicu chiri xeya __LB__chic chuvi quix are ta cut xcah hun __LB__baꜩ hun choven xecam ta chiripa __LB__zanic, xecam ta pu chuvi quix xcah __LB__rumal quichaquimal, qui ꜫaꜫ va__PC__ __LB__chibal puch cumal hun baꜩ hun __LB__chouen maui xe culax paha cu__PC__ __LB__mal quichac nabec xamaui que __LB__taam xavi cu pahuiub xequÿ vi __LB__e cu nimac pahzu ahbix rihun __LB__baꜩ hun chouen. xenimaquir cut __LB__nima caxcol rail. xeicou vi xecax__PC__ __LB__cobizaxic enimac etamanel chic __LB__xeuxic. xavixere e ahzu e ahbix __LB__e pu ahzibab, ahcot xevxic rono__PC__ __LB__hel chuꜩin cumal. xa xquetaam __LB__vi xealaxic xa xenauinac epu __LB__uquexel qui cahau ri xebe chi__PC__ __LB__xibalba caminac vi qui cahau __LB__e cu nimac etamanel ri hun baꜩ __LB__hun chouen chi qui qux ronohel __LB__nabec quetaam ta xevinaquir __LB__ri qui chac, macu xel apanoc qui__PC__ __LB__nauiquil rumal qui eae vachibal __LB__xa chiquih xcah vi v yoc qui qux __LB__maui banoh xepoizaxic cumal __LB__rihun ahpu xbalanque a xacu__PC__ — 18v — 18 __LB__vvbanic chiquibano huta quih __LB__maui queloꜫoxic rumal ri catit __LB__hun baꜩ hun choven. maui chiia __LB__quiva xbaninac vaim xepu va__PC__ __LB__inac ri hun baꜩ hun choven ta __LB__quevvlic, macu quecacaric oio__PC__ __LB__uaric xa chiquicuyu xere que__PC__ __LB__taam ri qui qoheic queheri zac Does this work for glottal at the subscript position? Or should I use OSU's "q,iquin"? __LB__cazah vloc ri q' iquin xeqha cut __LB__vꜩbala cohbe iuvq zaquiric xe __LB__qha curi caꜩ taxe chacouic. xca__PC__ __LB__minac cut quinaoh quicabichal __LB__chirech qui chaquic hun baꜩhun __LB__chouen, xa caꜩolcomih qui qoheic __LB__e upam, caꜩih ta chuxoc rumal ni__PC__ __LB__ma caxcol mi xquiban chique xoh __LB__camtah, xohzachtah puch xcah __LB__rioh quichac queheri ala xohpe __LB__vi vloc chiquiqux. quehe cut que __LB__cachac vi xa retal chicabano xe __LB__qhachiquibil quib. ta xebecut chi__PC__ __LB__la chuxe che cante vbi cachbilan __LB__curi caꜩ ta xebec xquitiquiba chi __LB__cut vvbanic maui ahilan chi Does this work for glottal at the subscript position? Or should I use OSU's "q,iquin"? __LB__quin. are curi q'iquin mahabi hun __LB__oc xcah vloc chuxe che, ri ca ꜩi__PC__ __LB__quin e maui quecah vloc. xahix __LB__cazah vloc xeqha cut chire caꜩ — 19r — __LB__vꜩbala xeqha cut. cate puch xeaca__PC__ __LB__nic chui che xnimar cut riche xzi__PC__ __LB__poh vpam cate cut xerah cah vloc __LB__macu vꜩ chic qui cahic vloc chuvi __LB__che hun baꜩ hun choven xeqha __LB__cu vloc chuvi che: hupacha cohv __LB__chanic ixcachac tocob cavach a __LB__reri che caxibin chic caquilo ix __LB__ca chac xecha vloc chuvi che xe __LB__qha curi hun ahpu xbalanque chi__PC__ __LB__quira ivex chixima xe ipam na__PC__ __LB__htic vꜩam chihurehe chivih ca__PC__ __LB__te cut vꜩ ibinic xevqhax chic cu__PC__ __LB__mal quichac. vve xecha cut ta __LB__xquihuruba cut vꜩam qui toc xa __LB__pu huzu qui he chi xuxic xa __LB__coy xquivachibeh chic cate cut __LB__xebe chui tac che chuti huyub __LB__nima huyub xebec patac quiche__PC__ __LB__lah, quevohon chic- quizilah chic __LB__chucab tac che quehe cut quicha __LB__catahic hun baꜩ hun chouen, __LB__cumal hun ahpu xbalanque. xa __LB__rumal qui naual ta xquibano, ta __LB__xeopon cut chicochoch xeqha cut __LB__xeoponic ruq catit ruq pu qui __LB__chuch ixcatit naquila mixqui__PC__ __LB__culvachih ri caꜩ xa rax qui vach __LB__mi xebec queheri e chicop chic __LB__xeqha cut vena quila mixiban __LB__chique ivaꜩ mi xinicalaba mi__PC__ __LB__pu xinichiquiba, mata quehe xi__PC__ __LB__ban chique ivaꜩ ixvi xqhari __LB__atit chiquech hun ahpu xba__PC__ __LB__lanque. xeqha chi cut chire ca__PC__ __LB__tit mi xbizonic ixcatit xchivil __LB__chic qui vach ri caꜩ xquevlic xe __LB__re chicut vtihovic va chive ix __LB__catit la qui mi xꜩeenic catihana __LB__qui quih xeqha cut cate puch x__PC__ __LB__quitiquiba zuanic, hun ahpu x coy __LB__xquizuah.

__LB__Catepuch xebixanic xezuanic __LB__xe cohomanic ta vcamic riqui zu __LB__qui cohom ta xcube puch ri catit __LB__cu q ta xezuanic xeziquix pa can't close tag on Hunahpu because the folio ends __LB__zu pa bix ta xubinaah ri hun — 19v — __LB__ahpu coy vbi zu ta xeoc cu vloc ri 19 __LB__hun baꜩ hun chouen quexahouic __LB__ta xevlic cate puch ta xmucun ri __LB__atit iꜩel qui vach xril atit ta __LB__xꜩeenic maui xucui vꜩe atit. __LB__xacu huzu xebec maui xil chi__PC__ __LB__quivach eiacatic xebe pa que__PC__ __LB__chelah naquipa chibano ixca__PC__ __LB__tit xa cah mul xchicatiho xa __LB__oxmul chic xquecaziquih pazu __LB__pa bix quichicuyu iꜩe catiha __LB__china xeqhachic hun ahpu xba__PC__ __LB__lanque cate xezuan chic, ta xe__PC__ __LB__oc chi vloc quexahou chic xe __LB__vl chic chi vnicahal vva ha xa __LB__ui ququz caquibano xavi ca qui__PC__ __LB__tac chiih ricatit chi ꜩe libah __LB__chi xꜩeen chiri catit quiꜩih ꜩe__PC__ __LB__ebal qui vach ri coy chixiriric __LB__xe qui pam chichilita xe puch __LB__vchi qui qux taxeoc vloc are __LB__cut qui chuꜩeeh atit cate xe __LB__bechic patac huiub. naquipa __LB__qui chicabano ixcatit xere chiva __LB__roxmulchic xchicatiho xqha__PC__ __LB__ri hun ahpu xbalanque. xezuan __LB__chic xevl chic quexahouic. xa __LB__cu chucuiuca vꜩe ri catit xe __LB__acan cu vloc chucatanah ꜩac __LB__caeruxruh vchi tac quivach __LB__muꜩumac qui chi chiquimal qui __LB__chi qui vach maca ma chiquiho __LB__quih chique ta xril chi cut ri atit __LB__cate xpocolih chi vꜩe ri catit __LB__machicu xil chiquivach rumal __LB__vꜩebal atit xerevi cua ixca__PC__ __LB__tit xquecapixabah vbic chuca__PC__ __LB__h mul cut xezuax chic macu __LB__xevl chic chucah mul huzu xe __LB__bec pa quechelah xeqha cut __LB__chire catit mi cu xcatiho ixca __LB__tit mi nabe xevlic mi pu xcatih __LB__chic qui ziquixic, mi xbizon cut __LB__oh qolic oh ivÿ xachilocoh ri ca __LB__chuch ixcatit quenabax ri caꜩ __LB__ta chuxoc mi xeqobic mi pu xebi__PC__ __LB__nahic hun baꜩ hun chouen — 20r — __LB__quevqhaxic xeqha ri hun ahpu xba__PC__ __LB__lanque xeziquix cut rumal ri ahzu __LB__ahbix, ri oher vinac are puch chu__PC__ __LB__zi quih ri ahzib ahcot oher xechi__PC__ __LB__copiric ecoy xevxic rumal xax __LB__quinimarizah quib xquiyoc ri qui __LB__chac quehevi calabil chiqui qux __LB__quehecut qui maixic ri ta xezachic __LB__ri hun baꜩhun choven. e chicop xe__PC__ __LB__vxic are cut erama quelal coccho__PC__ __LB__ch chic xavi xere e ahzu e ahbix __LB__nim chic xquibano ta xecoheic rug __LB__ratit rug pu quichuch

__LB__Ta x quitiquiba chicut quibanoh __LB__qui cutbal quib chuvach catit chu__PC__ __LB__vachpu qui chuch nabe xquibano __LB__ri abix. xa cohabixic ixcatit ix __LB__pu cachuch xeqha mi xbizonic oh __LB__qolic oh ivÿ oh qui quexel caꜩ __LB__xeqha curi hun ahpu xbalanque. __LB__ta xquicam cut quicah qui mixqui __LB__na qui xoquem xebec ruq huhun __LB__qui vvb xquiteleh xeel chi co cho__PC__ __LB__ch ta xquipixab cu catit chire __LB__vyaic qui va chiticoh na quih chi__PC__ __LB__beya cava ixcatit xeqha vꜩba__PC__ __LB__la ixvÿ xqha cut ri catit. cate cut __LB__xeopon chiri que abix vi xa qui __LB__xquichiquiba ri mi xquina puvleu __LB__xacu quichitahin ri mi xquina pu __LB__vleu macu qui chitahin ri mi xqui__PC__ __LB__na chutuquel. are curi icah xa __LB__vi chiquichiquiba chutoloc che __LB__xaui chucab rib che chibec chi__PC__ Does this work for showing the abbreviation -an? or should I just write: ã __LB__lahahic chibec ronohel che, caa-an __LB__ꜫaꜫ chacachoh chic chicatohche __LB__chuban ri xahuna icah are curi __LB__mi xquina ꜩaꜩ chicupuh maui __LB__ahilan tum quixic cuban rixa __LB__hun chi mi xquina maui ahilan __LB__cupuh xa chuti huyub nima hu__PC__ __LB__yub cabec ta xquipixabah cut hun __LB__chicop xmucur vbi xquituyuba __LB__acanoc chuvi nima cutam xeqha __LB__cut hun ahpu xbalanque xa __LB__chavil ri catit chipetic iaol ca va __LB__huzu catoquic tapetoc catecut — 20v — 20 __LB__chicachap ri mixquina ruq icah vꜩ __LB__bala xqha curi xmucur. are cut __LB__xa vvbanic chiquibano mana qui__PC__ __LB__ꜩih abixic ta chiquibano cate pu__PC__ __LB__ch choc ri xmucur anim cut que __LB__petic hun chichapo mi xquina, hun __LB__cut chichapou ri icah chiquipiz __LB__la qui vi xaloc chubacala vleu __LB__pu cab ri hun xaquehe chuꜩiloh __LB__vvach queheri quiꜩih abixom __LB__are curi hun chic xaloc chu pu__PC__ __LB__quih vvebalche puholom que__PC__ __LB__he uiri quiꜩih catohcheenel ta __LB__xil rumal catit catecut queva__PC__ __LB__ic maquiꜩih abixic chiquibano __LB__xaloc chibe yaoc qui va taxebe __LB__cut chicochoch quiꜩih mixohco__PC__ __LB__ꜩic ixcatit queqha queoponic xa __LB__loc chiqui qui quih, chiquiiuc puch __LB__cacan, qui eab chuvach catit taxe __LB__be chicut chu ca quih xeopon __LB__cut pa cabix quiz iacatahinac __LB__chic ronohel che caam vchapom __LB__chi rib rono hel tun quixic taxe__PC__ __LB__oponic. apa chinac cohmichouic __LB__xeqha cut are cut quebanou ri __LB__ronohel chuti chicop nima chicop __LB__coh balam, queh, vmul, iac, vtiu Does this work for glottal at the subscript position? OSU writes: "The h is overwritten with black ink in an unknown hand; all transcriptions say hun." __LB__Quequicot chicut xebec echaa __LB__hel, pahom nahtcu xechaahic qui __LB__tuquel xquimez rihom quicahau __LB__ta xquita cu vloc rahaual xibalba __LB__apa china chiri mixutiquiba chic __LB__eꜩanem pacavi mapu quequixbic __LB__quenicnot vl oc. mapu xecam ri __LB__hun hunahpu vvcubhunahpu xr__PC__ __LB__ah quinimarizah quib chicavach How to show this note from OSU? Basically, I need to show that the ꜫ below is written over a "c", but the "c" isn't crossed out __LB__heꜫu itacachic xeqha chic rihun __LB__came, vvcubcame conohel ahauab __LB__xetaca vloc xeqhacut chire qui __LB__zamahel quixqha quixoponic que __LB__petoc queqha ahauab varal tah __LB__cohchaah vi cuq vvcubix coheꜩanic __LB__quecha ahauab quixqha quixopo__PC__ __LB__nic xevqhax cut ri zamahel ta __LB__xepecut nimahoc cuquibe riga__PC__ __LB__holab chicochoch ca tocol chico__PC__ __LB__choch xacuyacal ri zamahel xo__PC__ __LB__pon ruq catit arecut quechahic __LB__taxul canoc vzamahel xibalba __LB__quiꜩih quepetic quecha riahauab __LB__xeqha cut ri vzamahel xibalba ta __LB__xchoye cu canoc quiquih cumal ri __LB__vzamahel xibalba vvcubix que__PC__ __LB__ꜩelavachixic xuqhax canoc xmu__PC__ __LB__cane vꜩbala. xquebe tac oc ixza__PC__ __LB__mahel xqhari atit, xebe curi za__PC__ __LB__mahel xezalihic ta xquiz cut v __LB__gux ri atit naqui xchiuvchah __LB__qui taquic ri vÿ, mavi quiꜩih ri — 22v — 22 NB: The OSU transcription includes space between letters and line-end -; xquilo varanel. are __LB__chicuri zic xa eaea chicop xquicoho __LB__chuvi zic hunacab chiyocouic cu__PC__ __LB__mal mi xecachaco xeqha varanel __LB__macuhabi xquiz ri chah xavi xe __LB__re vvach are curi zic mahabi na __LB__quila xquiꜩih chire; xavi xer e __LB__vvach xbeyaoc cuq ahauab na __LB__quipa que vxic apa xepevi achi__PC__ __LB__nac xeqaholanic xealanic qui__PC__ __LB__ꜩih cacatat caqux rumal ma __LB__vꜩ caquibano chi que, halan qui __LB__vach halan naipu qui qoheic xe __LB__qha chiquibil quib. ta xetacon cut __LB__conohel ahauab oho chahoc ix __LB__qaholab xevqhaxic ta xeꜩonox __LB__cut rumal hun came, vvcub came __LB__apa quix ixpevi chibÿh tah ixqa__PC__ __LB__holab xqha cut mavi que __LB__tuam xa xeqha chi que alaba __LB__xohpe vilo maui que taam xaxe __LB__qha maui xquibÿ vꜩbala xaca __LB__be cacachaah ixqaholab xe __LB__qha chi que vꜩ xechare __LB__ba chicacoh ri va ca __LB__quic xeqha. matah areta chi coh __LB__va que xeqha qaholab. maha __LB__bi are chicacoh va que xeqha __LB__chic. vꜩ bala xeqha __LB__qaholab hebala xahuchil xe __LB__qha , mabala xa holom __LB__coh qhachic xeqha qaholab ma __LB__habi xeqha vꜩ bala __LB__xqha ta xzac cu vloc __LB__rumal __LB__mic quivah chi que ch mata __LB__xohbe itaca, matapu xbeiza__PC__ __LB__mahel quiꜩih tocob ca vach __LB__xacohbec xeqha qaholab chi__PC__ __LB__que. are tacu xahauax chi que — 25v — 25 __LB__qaholab huzu ta xcam rihun chi __LB__ri chiri chi cha xechacatah tah __LB__maui que he xa xecha__PC__ __LB__catah chic cumal qaholab maba __LB__quixbec ixqaholab cohchah na __LB__xa are cacacoho __LB__huticab cana muchit. huticab cu __LB__ri nimac xeqha. vꜩbala __LB__xeqhacut qaholab ta xcah cut __LB__qui cha ah hunam qui chucab ꜩaꜩ __LB__pu qui cha ri qaholab, xacu qui ruꜩ __LB__qui qux ta xquiya quib chicha __LB__catahic ri qaholab. que quicot __LB__cut ri ta xechacatahic __LB__vꜩ mi xcabano nabe mixecacha __LB__co xeqha apa xchibe __LB__qui camavi ri coq,ih xeqha chi__PC__ __LB__qui qux. qui ꜩih ta acab chiia __LB__ri ca coq,ih cachacom puch xe __LB__vqhax puch qaholab __LB__que rumal __LB__vꜩbala acaba chicut cohcha__PC__ __LB__ahic xeqha cut ta xepixaban __LB__quib cate chicut ta xeoc chi __LB__qaholab pachaim ha vcabti__PC__ __LB__hobal are ta cut xa__PC__ __LB__hauaxchic xecatacoxtah ru__PC__ __LB__mal cha chanim tah chiqui__PC__ __LB__qux xecam tah chiquiqux __LB__macu xecamic ta xeqha chi__PC__ __LB__re cha, ta xquipixabah are __LB__ive ri ronohel v tiohil chi__PC__ __LB__cop xeqha chire cha macu __LB__xezilab chic, xa hun cah chi__PC__ __LB__vi cha ronohel are cut chacon ahauab __LB__vꜩbala xeqha cut ta xebe curi __LB__zanic conohel e camol coꜩih v __LB__ticon hun came, vvcub came mier __LB__oc cut chiquipixabah chahal qui __LB__coꜩih ri laqui chivila ca __LB__coꜩih miya chi elecaxic rumal __LB__ri mi xecachaco ri qaholab a __LB__navi xpevi rilo cachacon cu― __LB__mal mahabi chivarah hun a __LB__cab vꜩbala xeqha cut macu __LB__xquina ri chahal ticon xaloc __LB__chiquiracuh qui chi chucab tac __LB__che ticon puch que bechacala chi__PC__ __LB__ri xavi xere chiquiqhabeh ri __LB__quibix xpurpuvec, xpurpu__PC__ __LB__uec qhari hun ta choquic pu __LB__huyu, puhuyu chachic ta cho__PC__ __LB__quic ri puhuyu vbi e caib chi__PC__ __LB__chahal ticon vticon hun came __LB__vvcub came macu caquina ri ✎__LB__zanic elecai qui chahem cabolo__PC__ ✎__LB__vic catucuvic erai coꜩih ri cabe __LB__catova vloc coꜩih chuviche re ca __LB__zicou cuq chuxeche ri coq,ih xa __LB__que he chiquiracuh qui chi ri cha__PC__ __LB__halib mana re caquinao ca __LB__ric. cate cut ta xul zamahel ta__PC__ __LB__conel que petoc caqha ahau hu__PC__ __LB__zuc chiquicam vlari cachacon __LB__xevqhax cut qaholab. vꜩ bala __LB__xeqha cut qui ti que laon curi qaho__PC__ __LB__lab xahuna cabil xquichap __LB__zanic ta quiya pazel.que he __LB__cut xezac cahe riconohel xi__PC__ — 26v — 26 __LB__balba zacbuc qui vach rumal __LB__ri coꜩih catecut xquitac ri cate puch xhix quichi __LB__quitohbal quichahin chicle__PC__ __LB__caxic quehe cut quichacatahic ✎__LB__hun came vvcub came cu__PC__ __LB__mal que __LB__v xe ribanoh ri. ta xquicam ri __LB__qui chi herebaca quichi purpuec __LB__herebaca vac amic cate chi__PC__ __LB__cut ta xcahchaah xaui xe __LB__re hunam que chaahic x que __LB__leh chicu chaah ta xepixaban __LB__chicu quib zacaric chic xeqha__PC__ __LB__vzbala xeqha qaho__PC__ __LB__lab ta x que leh.

__LB__Xeoc chicut pateuh ha ma__PC__ __LB__ui ahilan teu ꜩaꜩ chi zacbocom __LB__chupan ha rochoch teu huzu __LB__cu zꜩah teu rumal cuꜩ mama__PC__ __LB__ina xzach ri teu cumal qaho__PC__ __LB__lab maui xecamic xavi e __LB__qazlic ta xzaquiric areta cu __LB__xcah chirita xecam __LB__vi maui que he xavi quꜩ qui __LB__vach ta xzaquiric xe que l chi__PC__ __LB__vla tacol que xebe chic e __LB__chahal na quipala maui mi__PC__ __LB__xecamic xqha chi rahaual xi__PC__ __LB__balba xquimaihah chic qui__PC__ __LB__banoh qaholab xba__PC__ __LB__lan que

__LB__Cate xeoc chicut pabala __LB__mi ha ꜩaꜩ chibalam balam __LB__rochoch maui cohitio qo ivech __LB__chuxic xevqhaxic balam cate __LB__cut xquipuquih baca chi quiva__PC__ __LB__ch chicop cate cut que pa__PC__ __LB__caquic ch irichuvi baca micu __LB__xevꜩinic mi xutih qui qux ca__PC__ __LB__teviri mix xquia quib are qui__PC__ __LB__baquil ri caxuxic xeqha ri — 27r — __LB__varanel conohel qui quiqux chi__PC__ __LB__re macuxecamic xavi xere vꜩ __LB__quivach xeel vloc pabalami ha __LB__naquipa quichi e vinaquil apa __LB__qui xepe vi xeqha ri co__PC__ __LB__nohel

__LB__Cate chic xeoc chupam eae __LB__hun ha chieae, xa vtu que l eae v __LB__pam maui xecatic rumal, xa __LB__bolol, xa ꜩimah vi xavi xere __LB__vꜩ chi quivach ta xzaquiric a __LB__reta cahauaxic huzuc ta que__PC__ __LB__camic chupan ri, que icou vi ma__PC__ __LB__ui que he xavi __LB__cazach quiqux rumal.

__LB__Xecoh chic chupan zoꜩin ha __LB__vtu que l zoꜩ chupam chiha __LB__hun ha chi camazoꜩ nimac chi__PC__ __LB__cop que heri cha quiꜩam quica__PC__ __LB__mizabal huzu chuꜩinic chopon __LB__chi quivach. xeqohe cu chiri chu__PC__ __LB__pam xa pa vvb xevar vi ma __LB__vi xetÿc rumal ri e qo pa ha __LB__chiri cut xquiya vi quib hun vi ✎__LB__rumal hun chicama zoꜩ chica__PC__ __LB__h xpevi carah cu mucum vloc __LB__chu ꜩam vvb xavi vcutbal rib __LB__ta xquibano rumal qo caqui__PC__ __LB__ꜩonoh vi quinaoh hun acab __LB__curi zoꜩ que buhuhic quiliꜩ __LB__quiliꜩ que qha, que qha hun__PC__ __LB__acab. xtane curi zcaquin ma__PC__ __LB__habi chic que zilobic ri zoꜩ chi__PC__ __LB__ri cu chacal viri hun ꜩam v__PC__ __LB__vb. xchacuri que hu__PC__ __LB__nahpu cahanic pa vzaquiric __LB__cauilo cahanican labalo vila __LB__na xqha cut qui cu are carah __LB__mucum vloc chuchi vvb __LB__carah ril vloc vzaquiric ca__PC__ __LB__te puch ta xcupix vholom __LB__rumal cama zoꜩ cupul chi __LB__chic chizilabic xaquichico__PC__ __LB__zoz chic cate cut xuquixbih __LB__que araroc mixcaya __LB__yan xcha cut chila cut xbe __LB__colana vi vholom chuvi hom __LB__xavi vꜩih hun came vvcub __LB__ta xuꜩonoh cut que cha na __LB__qui tac pa ivecha chi huhunal __LB__are quixnutac vi chicam vl __LB__oc ri ivecha xqha cut xba__PC__ __LB__lan que chi que vꜩbala xe __LB__qha cut ta xebec e nimachicop quipu __LB__ca v xambe canahoc ri ꜩiz coc __LB__xbe vcama cubalcatih chuꜩam __LB__capetic are cut xoc halvac hi__PC__ __LB__bal vholom hunahpu libahchi __LB__xcotox vbaca v vac ꜩaꜩ chi ahna__PC__ __LB__oh chicah xpevi arev quxcah __LB__huracan xulcoloc xuluculoc chi__PC__ __LB__ri pa zoꜩiha macuatan xuꜩi__PC__ __LB__nic v vach vꜩ chic xuxic xa __LB__uixare vchuuc hebel hi__PC__ __LB__nic xavi xare xqhauic are __LB__cut ta chirah zaquiric chi __LB__cactarin vxe cah caxaqui__PC__ __LB__nachic ama xuchax ri vuch __LB__ve xqhari mama ta chixa__PC__ __LB__quinic cate ta chi que xavi xare chvbaqui__PC__ — 28r — __LB__tila vholom quehe ri quiꜩih v __LB__holom xuxic. cate cut ta xqui__PC__ __LB__ban quiꜩih xepixaban quib __LB__mana qui catchaahic xa quichaye __LB__cuh auib xainhun quiquibanouic __LB__xqha xbalanque chire cate cut __LB__taxupixabah hun vmul catqole __LB__tachiri chuvihom chivi catqohe __LB__vi chupan pixc xuqhax vmul __LB__rumal xbalanque chopon na __LB__quic avq cate catelic ca inqui__PC__ __LB__banouic xuqhax ri vmul ta x__PC__ __LB__pixabaxic chacab cate cut ta __LB__xzaquiric xavi xare vꜩqui__PC__ __LB__vach qui cabichal.

__LB__xcah chicu quichaah colan __LB__chicu vholom hun ahpu chuvi __LB__hom. mi xcachacoyan, mixibano __LB__quiyan mi xiyao xevqhaxic xa __LB__vi cu xere chiziquin hun ahpu __LB__chacaca ri holom chi quic que__PC__ __LB__vqhaxic macu chiqui ca caxou __LB__chic chiyecoub quib. are cu xe__PC__ __LB__ꜩacou quic rahaual xibalba __LB__xucul cut xbalanque tacal __LB__curi quic chuvach bate chita__PC__ __LB__nenic ta xelic huzu cu xicou __LB__quic chuvihom xahun xaca__PC__ __LB__nab vi tacal pa pix taxel cu__PC__ __LB__ri vmul chicoxcotic ta xbec __LB__ocotal cut. ta xbe cumal ri xi__PC__ __LB__balba quehuminic, que chani__PC__ __LB__nic xebe chirih ri vmul xe __LB__quiz be conohel xibalba cate__PC__ __LB__cut xquicamix tah ri vho__PC__ __LB__lom hun ahpu. xtiquixtah chic __LB__vcoc xbalanque are chicut __LB__xbe quicuba ri coc chuvi hom __LB__quiꜩih holom chicu vholom __LB__ri hunahpu quequicot chicu __LB__qui cabichal. are cut quebe __LB__ꜩucuna quic rixibalba cate __LB__cut xquicamixtah chiri quic __LB__pa pix, ta xeziquin chicut quix __LB__petoc vae quic que mix cari__PC__ __LB__co. xeqha quicolem chicut __LB__ta xeul xibalba na qui pa ri — 28v — 28 __LB__mi xquilo xeqhacut tax quiti__PC__ __LB__quiba chicut chaahic. hunam __LB__chaahic chicut xquiban chic __LB__qui cabichal cate cut xcaca__PC__ __LB__tah ri coc rumal xbalanque __LB__chi pucabin ri coc xcah pa ho__PC__ __LB__m zaquiram curi vzaquilal __LB__chiqui vach. na qui pa ri chibe __LB__icama apa qo vi ri camol re __LB__xqha xibalba. quehe cut qui __LB__chacatahic rahal xibalba __LB__rumal hun ahpu xbalanque __LB__nima caxcol xecohevi ma__PC__ __LB__ui are xecam vi ri ronohel __LB__xban chique.

__LB__AAre cut vae quinabal qui__PC__ __LB__camic hun ahpu xbalanque are __LB__va qui nabal qui camic xchica __LB__bÿh chic. ta xepixabah cut xqui__PC__ __LB__bano ronohel caxcol rail xban __LB__chique maui xecamic rumal __LB__vtihobal xibalba maui xecha__PC__ __LB__catahic rumal ronohel tionel __LB__chicopo qo chi xibalba cate __LB__cut ta xquitac chi caib nic vachi__PC__ __LB__nel queheri e ilol are qui bi __LB__va xulupacam e etamanel __LB__v ve cohꜩonoxic chive cumal __LB__rahaual xibalba rumal ri ca __LB__camic quinaoh caquinuc ru __LB__mal ri maui mi xohcamic, ma __LB__pu mi xohchacatahic mixcaza__PC__ __LB__ch quitihobal, maxa chicopch__PC__ __LB__oc chique, are cu retal va chi __LB__caqux chohim abah camiza__PC__ __LB__bal que cumal mi xecuchu __LB__quib ronohel xibalba macu __LB__quiꜩih ta cohcamic. are cuina __LB__oh va xchicabÿh v ve quix __LB__vl ꜩonobex xoc cumal chire __LB__ch cacamic ta cohcatoc naqui __LB__xchicuchah ix xulu, ix pacam __LB__v ve queqha chive ma vꜩ lo __LB__chicatix ta quibaquil pazi__PC__ __LB__van v ve maba vꜩ xavi xere __LB__chic chiqaztah quivach quix __LB__qha vveba are vꜩ xachica xe__PC__ — 29r — __LB__queba chuvi che ta queqha chic __LB__chive. xax ma vꜩ vi xavi xere __LB__chivil chiquivach quixqha ta __LB__quecha chicut chiroxmul xa __LB__bare ruꜩil xachicatix quiba__PC__ __LB__quil pa racan ha ve cut quix __LB__vchax chic cumal are vꜩ bala __LB__quecamic cate cu vꜩ chihoc qui __LB__baquil chuvach abah que heri __LB__chiqueex cahim hal huhunal __LB__cu chiqueic cate cu chitix vbic __LB__chiracan a chiri cahcua chibe __LB__chuti huyub nima huyub quix__PC__ __LB__qha cut ta chicutunizah ri ca__PC__ __LB__pixab mi xcabÿh chive xe __LB__qha xhunahpu xbalanque __LB__ta xepixabic xquetamah qui __LB__camic. are caban rinima chohim __LB__abah queheri chohibal qui xqui__PC__ __LB__ban xibalba nimac xac xquico__PC__ __LB__ho. cate cut xul zamahel achbi__PC__ __LB__lai que vzamahel hun came __LB__vvcub came quepetoc coh be. __LB__ta cuq qaholab chibeta qui__PC__ __LB__la caquixcachohih caqha aha__PC__ __LB__u ixqaholab xevqhaxic vꜩ __LB__bala xeqha cut anim xebec __LB__xeopon cut chuchi choh chiri __LB__cut xerah chih vi chi eꜩanem. __LB__cachopih vae ri ca qui cah__PC__ __LB__tacmul tah chica xicah chica __LB__huhunal ixqaholab xeqhax __LB__cut rumal hun came. maui a __LB__re cohimich vi ri mapa queta__PC__ __LB__am cacamic ixahauab chivi__PC__ __LB__la na xeqha cut ta xquicula__PC__ __LB__vachih qui vach xqui rip qui __LB__cab qui cabichal epu hupu__PC__ __LB__huh ta xebec pa choh chiri __LB__cut xecam vi qui cabichal que __LB__quicot chicut ronohel xibalba. __LB__tacal quiyuyub tacal qui xul __LB__cab mixecachaco quiꜩih mavi __LB__a tan xquiya quib xeqha. cate __LB__cut qui taquic ri xulu pacam __LB__xcanahvi quiꜩih xavi xare __LB__xꜩonox rixbe vi qui ba quil — 29v — 29 __LB__ta xequihin xibalba xhoc qui ba __LB__quil xbe tixoc chi racan a macu __LB__xebeta chinah xa huzu xecah __LB__chuxe a chaom qaholab xe __LB__vxic xavi xere qui vach xuxic __LB__xecutun chicut.

__LB__Chi robix cut xecutun chix xe __LB__il chi ya rumal vinac e caib que __LB__heri xavinac car xevachinic __LB__ta xil qui vach cumal xibalba __LB__xeꜩucux cut chitac ya xchu __LB__eca cut quecutunoc e caib chi __LB__meba aꜩiyac quivach aꜩiiac __LB__pu quih aꜩiiac cut qui cu mana __LB__chibanan ta qui vach ta __LB__qui xeilic rumal xibalba hala __LB__chicut xquibano xa xahoh puhuy __LB__xahoh cux xayboy xqui xa __LB__ho xa xꜩul, xa chitic xqui xah __LB__chic quiia maihabal xquiban __LB__chic xquiporoh ha queheri qui __LB__ꜩih chicatic libah chicut chivi__PC__ __LB__naquir chic. ꜩaꜩ chi xibalba chica__PC__ __LB__yic cate chiquipuz quib chicam __LB__hun chique chipune na chicami __LB__naquil nabe chiquicamizah quib __LB__xaui xere libah chicaztah vi chi __LB__vvach xa quicay xibalba ta chi__PC__ __LB__quibano ronohel xquiban chic __LB__v xenaahic chic chacbal quech __LB__xibalba cumal.

__LB__Cate chi puch roponic chic v __LB__ꜩihel quixahoh chi xiquin aha__PC__ __LB__uab huncame, vvcub came xch__PC__ __LB__a ta xquitao naqui ri caibme__PC__ __LB__ba la quiꜩih vi chi quz. quiꜩih __LB__vi pu chihebelic quixahouic __LB__ronohel caquibano xqha cut __LB__quiꜩihoxic xoponic cuq ahauab __LB__quz xquitao ta xbochi cut qui __LB__zamahel tacol chique petoc ch__PC__ __LB__vl ta quibana cacay queca ma__PC__ __LB__ihah tah quecacayih ta puch __LB__quecha ahauab quixqha chi__PC__ __LB__que xuqhax ri zamahel xeo__PC__ __LB__pon cut cuq ri xahol ta xqhav __LB__cut quiꜩih ahauab chique — 30r — __LB__mabachicah rumal ri quiꜩih __LB__cohxobic maxa mavi cohquix__PC__ __LB__bic cohoc apanoc chi ahaual ha __LB__rumal qui iꜩel cavach maxa__PC__ __LB__qui nimac vbac cavach chi meba __LB__maxaon ril chire xaoh xahol __LB__naquita chicabÿh chique cach __LB__meba qo cam curaih naypu ri __LB__ca xahoh caquicaztah quivach __LB__cuq maquehela cu xchicaban __LB__chique ri ahauab quehe cu ma __LB__vi cacah vi ixzamahel xeq__PC__ __LB__ha cut ri hun ahpu xbalanque __LB__xelehebex na qui vach chuvi __LB__ra chuvi cax cacrail xebec __LB__maui atan xcah benam quia __LB__mul xchihic xa chimachcay __LB__zamahel chiquivach camol que __LB__ta xebe cut ruq ahau.

__LB__Xeopon puch cuq ahauab __LB__Quemocho chic chiqui xule la __LB__qui vach xeoponic xqui que__PC__ __LB__melah quib chiquiluc quib __LB__chiquipach quib chimayoquih __LB__chiaꜩiac quiꜩih vi chimeba qui __LB__vachibal xeoponic ta xꜩonox __LB__cut quihuyubal camac puch __LB__xꜩonox naipuch qui chuch qui __LB__cahau apa quixpevi xevqha__PC__ __LB__xic. maba quetaon at ahau ma __LB__ui xquetaamah vvach ca chuch __LB__cacahau ca oh chutic oc ta xe__PC__ __LB__camic xa xeqha maui naquila __LB__xquibÿh. vꜩbala chiban ta ba __LB__ca cay naqui chivah yvahil chi__PC__ __LB__cayao xevqhaxic. maba cacah __LB__quiꜩih chicacaxibih quib xeqha __LB__chic chire ahau. mi xibih ivib __LB__mix xobic quixxahouoc. are __LB__ta nabe chixah ri quixpuzu ta __LB__ivib chiporoh ta curi vochoch __LB__chibana ronohel ri ivetaam __LB__cohcay tah cacah are vma ca __LB__qux quixbetacoc rumal ixme__PC__ __LB__ba chicaya ivahil xevqhax __LB__cut ta xquitiquiba cut quibix __LB__qui xahoh ta xulcut ronohel — 30v — 30 __LB__ri xibalba xepulic ecayel ro __LB__nohel cut xquixaho xquixah __LB__cux, xquixah puhuy, xquixah __LB__yboy xqha cu ahau chique __LB__chipuzu ri nu ꜩÿ chicaztah chi __LB__vvach ivvmal xevqhaxic ve __LB__xeqha. ta xquipuz ꜩÿ xqaztai __LB__chi vvach quiꜩih cu chiquicot __LB__ri ꜩÿ ta xqaztah vvach chuzac__PC__ __LB__bizala vhe ta xqaztah v vach __LB__xqha cuahau chique chiporo__PC__ __LB__h naba vochoch xevqhaxchic __LB__ta xquiporoh cut rochoch ahau __LB__e pulinac ahauab pa ha conohel __LB__maui xecatic libah chichic x__PC__ __LB__cuꜩinizah mana huzu zachic __LB__ri rochoch huncame xquimai__PC__ __LB__hah cut conohel ahauab xa __LB__vi cu xere quexahouic nim __LB__quequicotic xevqhax chicut __LB__rumal ahau chicamizah na __LB__cuhun vinac chipuzu mata __LB__cu chicamic xevqhaxcut vꜩ __LB__bala xeqha taxquichap cut __LB__hun vinac cate xquipuzu xqui__PC__ __LB__poeoh cu acanoc vquxrihun __LB__vinac xquicoloba cut chiqui__PC__ __LB__vach ahauab xquimaiha chi __LB__cut hun came, vvcub came li __LB__bah chi cut xqazta chi v vach __LB__rihun vinac cumal nim chi__PC__ __LB__quicot vqux taxqaztah v __LB__vach xquimaihah cut ahau__PC__ __LB__ab. chipuzuna china cuivib __LB__chiquiltah quiꜩih curaih ca __LB__qux ri ixahoh xeqha chi cu __LB__ahauab vꜩbala at ahau __LB__xeqhacut cate puch xquipuz __LB__quib are cu xpuz ri xhun ah__PC__ __LB__pu rumal xbalanque huhu__PC__ __LB__nal cu xperepoxic racan vcab __LB__xelvholom xcole aponoc chi __LB__nah xcotix vloc vqux xche__PC__ __LB__que chuvach ꜩalic quecabar __LB__curi ronohel rahaual __LB__Cate puch vrainic vmalinic __LB__pu quiqux ahauab chire qui __LB__xahoh xhun ahpu xbalanque __LB__taxelcu quiꜩih hun came, v__PC__ __LB__vcub came chibana chique cohipuzu __LB__xeqha cut hunal tah __LB__cohipuzu xecha cut hun ca__PC__ __LB__me vvcubcame chiquerix__PC__ __LB__hunahpu xbalanque vꜩbala __LB__chiqaztah ivach mapaixqo __LB__cam, oh pu quicotirizai ive ix __LB__pu rahaual iv al iqahol xe __LB__qha cut chique ahauab. are __LB__cu nabe xpuzri quivholom __LB__ahau hun came vbi rahaual __LB__xibalba. caminac chicut hun __LB__came taxchap chic vvcub ca__PC__ __LB__me maui xqaztah chi qui vach __LB__cate pu quelic xibalba chica__PC__ __LB__can are xquil ri ahauab xe __LB__camic e xaraxoh chubic epu __LB__xaraxoxinac qui cabichal xa __LB__cu cahizabal qui vach xbanic __LB__huzuc xucamibeh rihun aha__PC__ __LB__u mana xquiqaztah chi vvach __LB__are curi hun ahau xelahna __LB__xoc na chiquivach ri e xahol __LB__maui xuculu mapu xurico to__PC__ __LB__cob nu vach xqha ta xuna rib __LB__xequiz cubec ronohel cal qui __LB__qahol panima zivan xa hun __LB__xquibalih vi quib panima __LB__xolobachan chiri cut etubul __LB__vi ta xculun cut maui ahi__PC__ __LB__lan chi zanic tuculÿ vla que __LB__pa zivan quehe ri xebeyox __LB__vloc ta xevl cut xquixul __LB__quiya chiquib conohel xeul __LB__elahoc xeul pu ococ quehe __LB__cut quechacatahic rahaual __LB__xibalba, xamaihabal xa pu — 31v — 31 __LB__qui halvachibal quib ta xqui__PC__ __LB__bano. cate puch ta xquibÿh __LB__qui bi, xquicobizah quib chi__PC__ __LB__qui vach conohel xibalba.

__LB__Chitaa cabi xchicabÿh. xch__PC__ __LB__icabÿh naipuch vbi cacahau __LB__chive ohva, oh xhun ahpu __LB__xbalanque cabi arecu ca ca__PC__ __LB__hau ri xicamizah hun hunah__PC__ __LB__pu vvcub hun ahpu quibi oh __LB__cu pacol re vae quirail qui ca__PC__ __LB__xcol ri cacahau quehe cut mix__PC__ __LB__cacuyu vi ronohel caxcol mi__PC__ __LB__xiban chique. quehe cut quix __LB__cazach vi ivonohel quixcami__PC__ __LB__zah mahabi chic colotahel chi__PC__ __LB__ve xevqhax cut cate puch que __LB__lahic coquic conohel xibalba __LB__tocob ca vach ixhunahpu xba__PC__ __LB__lanque quiꜩih vi xohmacunic __LB__chique ri icahau quibÿh la __LB__cute e mucul chi pucbal chah __LB__xeqha cut. vꜩbala areba ri __LB__caꜩih xchicabÿh chive chitaa __LB__ivonohel ix xibalba rumal __LB__mana nim chiiquih ivalaxic __LB__chuxic ruq naipuch mavi ni__PC__ __LB__m chi icochibal xzcaquin chic __LB__chi quic holomax mavi chahom __LB__quic ive xa xot, xaacam, xa __LB__chuch chire xheraxic xa naipu __LB__ral quim ral tolob chivechah __LB__macu ivech ri ronohel zaquil __LB__al zaquil qahol xanoh chiꜩa__PC__ __LB__co rib chivach. are ri ahmac __LB__ah labal, ah biz, ah moquen __LB__chac na vmac quixoc vi mana __LB__xa rax chapom ronohel vinac __LB__chibano quixtaon puch chuvi __LB__ri quic holomax, xevqhax cut __LB__conohel xibalba, quehe cut ti__PC__ __LB__carinac qui zachic vmaixic na__PC__ __LB__ipuch quiziquixic. maui nim __LB__qui quih oher xa xrah ꜩa vi vi__PC__ __LB__nac oher quiꜩih mana cabavil1 __LB__quibi oher xavi xibal oher iꜩel __LB__quivach e ahꜩa ahtucur, e tac__PC__ — 32r — __LB__chinel chimac chilabal; enaipu __LB__ah muculic qux, e quecail za__PC__ __LB__quiilah moxvach, ahlaꜩab que __LB__vqhaxic. chixeon quivach que __LB__culutahic; quehe cut vzachic __LB__qui nimal cacal, maui nim __LB__chi cahavarem xuxic. are __LB__xebanou ri xhun ahpu, xba __LB__lan que . are cut coquic cazi__PC__ __LB__quin ri catit chuvach ri ahau __LB__ri xquitic canoc xpevtux ri __LB__ah cate xchaquih chic are __LB__cut taxecat pachoh taxpe __LB__chicut vtux ri ah catecut __LB__xcaton ricatit xucat ri pom __LB__chuvach riah vnatabal quech __LB__rÿ. are xquicot vi vqux catit __LB__ri chu camul xpe vtux ri ah __LB__ta xcabauilax rumal catit ta __LB__xubinatizah cut nicah ha, ni __LB__cah bi choc. cazamah chatam __LB__vleu vbi xuxic are cut xu__PC__ __LB__binaah vi nicah ha, nicah bichoc __LB__rumal xa chunicahal vpa co__PC__ __LB__choch xquitic ah. are chi cu __LB__xubinaah vi chatam vleu __LB__cazam ah chuvi chata vleu __LB__quitic vi ah. are nai pu xubi__PC__ __LB__naah vi cazam ah rumal xpe __LB__vtux ah ta xcoh vbi rumal x__PC__ __LB__mucane xquitic can oc hun__PC__ __LB__ahpu xbalanque xanatabal __LB__que rumal atit. are curi nabe __LB__quicahau xoheroc quecamoc ri __LB__hun hunahpu vvcub hun ahpu __LB__xquil chicut vvachri qui cahau __LB__chila chi xibalba. xqhau chic qui __LB__cahau chiquetax xquichac xi__PC__ __LB__balba. somehow left out of flat, added by me

__LB__Vacute vviquic chic qui ca__PC__ __LB__hau cumal are xquivic ri vvcub __LB__hunahpu chila xbe quivica vi chi __LB__pucbal chah xavi xere vvach x__PC__ chah written over c*hah, not sure what was crossed out __LB__rah vxic xꜩonox cut chire vbi __LB__ronohel vchi vꜩam vbac vvach __LB__xuric nabe vbi xacu zcaquin __LB__chic xchatahvi xere maui xu__PC__ — 32v — 32 __LB__bÿh chi vbi ri vhunalpuil vchi __LB__xerepu xchatah chivi quehe __LB__cut ta xquinimah vi canahoc v __LB__qux qui cahau xaui xcanah chi __LB__pucbachah chiri quixziquix vi __LB__chuxic xeqha chivqahol chirech __LB__ta xcubax vquxnabe chel ive __LB__nabe naipuch. quixquihiloxic __LB__rumal zaquil al zaquil ꜭahol __LB__maui chizachic ibita chuxoc xe __LB__qha chirech qui cahau ta xqui__PC__ __LB__cuba vqux xa oh pacolica__PC__ __LB__mic izachic caxcol rail xban __LB__chiue quehe cut quipixabic __LB__ri xchacatahinac oc ronohel __LB__xibalba taxeacan culoc vara__PC__ __LB__le nicahzaC huzu cu xeacan not sure how to deal with big C __LB__chicah. hun cu quih hun naipu __LB__ic chique ta xzaquiric vpam __LB__cah v vach vleu chi cah xeqo__PC__ this q looks like a ꜭ to me __LB__heui are cut cachacanic ri o__PC__ __LB__much qaholab xecam rumal __LB__zipacna are cut cachbil xu__PC__ __LB__xic e vchumilal cah xevxic.

__LB__Vae cut vtiqueric ta xnaohix __LB__vinac ta xꜩucux puch ri choc vtio__PC__ __LB__hilvinac xeqha cut ri alom qa__PC__ __LB__holom, e ꜩacol bitol tepeu cucu__PC__ __LB__maꜩ quibi mi xyopihic vzaqui__PC__ __LB__ric mi xꜩac vꜩinic, mi pu xcaleic __LB__ꜩucul cool zaquil al zaquilqa__PC__ __LB__hol mixeale vinac v vinaquil __LB__v vach vleu xeqha, xmolomanic __LB__xulic xbe quinaoh chi queꜫumal __LB__chiaeabal ta xquiꜩucuh xqui__PC__ __LB__pucuh puch xenaohinic xebizon __LB__puch varal quehecut xelvia __LB__ponoc qui naoh zaquil calal xqui__PC__ __LB__rico xquicanaizah puch ri xoc __LB__vtiohil vinac xazcaquin chic ma __LB__ui cauachin quih ic chumil pa __LB__qui vi e ꜩacol bitol.

__LB__Pan paxil, pan cayala vbi xpe __LB__vi eanahal zaquihal.

__LB__Are cuquibi chicop va camolre __LB__cha. yac, vtiu, quel, hoh ecahib __LB__chi chicop xbÿn vꜩihel ꜫanahal __LB__ — 33r — __LB__zaquihal chique chila quepe vi __LB__pan paxil xcut vbeel paxil are __LB__cut xquirico rÿ echa arecut xoc __LB__vtiohil vinac ꜩac, vinac bit ha cut __LB__vquiquel vquiquel vinac xuxic are __LB__xoc cumal alom qaholom ri hal. __LB__quehe cut xequicot vi rumal ri __LB__vriquitahic vꜩilah huyub no__PC__ __LB__hinac chi quz ꜩaꜩ chi eana hal za __LB__quihal ꜩaꜩ naipuch chipec chi __LB__caco maui ahilan tulul cauex __LB__quinom tapal, ahache cab nohi__PC__ __LB__nac quilah echa chupan ritina__PC__ __LB__mit pan paxil pan cayala vbi __LB__qo vi echa v vachinel ronohel chu__PC__ __LB__tiecha, nima echa, chuti ticon, ni__PC__ __LB__ma ticon xcut vbeel cuma chicop __LB__ta xqueex cut ri cana hal zaqui__PC__ __LB__hal beleheb cu vcaal xuban __LB__xmucane echa xoquic ruqha __LB__ropenal xvinaquir veabchial __LB__v eanaal vinac xuxic ta xqui__PC__ __LB__ban ri alom qaholom, tepeuh __LB__cucumaꜩ quevqhaxic cate cut __LB__xquicoh paꜩih vꜩaquic vbitic __LB__canabe chuch cahau xaꜫana __LB__hal zaquihal vtiohil xa echa ra__PC__ __LB__can veab vinac ri e canabe ca__PC__ __LB__hau e cahib chivinac ꜩac xa __LB__echa oquinac quitiohil.

__LB__Vae quibi naabe vinac xeꜩa__PC__ __LB__quic xebitic. are nabe vinac ri __LB__Balam qui ꜩe. vcab chicut Ba__PC__ __LB__lam acab. roxchi cut Mahucutah. __LB__vcah cut Iquibalam. are cu __LB__quibi ri canabe chuch cahau.

__LB__Xa ꜩac xa bit que vqhaxic __LB__mahabi quichuch mahabi qui__PC__ __LB__cahau xa vtuquel achih chica__PC__ __LB__bÿh mana ixoc xealanic ma __LB__naipu xeqaholaxic rumal ri __LB__ah ꜩac ahbit ri alom qaholom __LB__xapuz xa naual quiꜩaquic qui __LB__bitic rumal ri ꜩacol bitol alom __LB__qaholom, tepeu cucumaꜩ. ta __LB__xevinac vachin cut evinac __LB__xevxic xeqhavic, xe ꜩihon — 33v — 33 __LB__puch xemucunic, xetaon puch __LB__xebinic, xechapanic, evꜩilah __LB__vinac e chaom achihil vach qui __LB__vachibal qo quxlab xuxic xe __LB__mucum naipuch huzuc xopon __LB__qui mucubal xquiz quilo, xquiz __LB__quetamah ronohel xecah vue __LB__quemucunic libah chi chiqui__PC__ __LB__zol vachih chizolmucuh puch __LB__vpam cah upam vleu mahu__PC__ __LB__catahil na chiquilixtah rono__PC__ __LB__hel maquebin tanaon nabe __LB__cate ta chiquil ri vxecah xavi __LB__chire e qovi ta quemucunic __LB__ꜩaꜩ quetamabal xuxic xicou __LB__qui vachibal pache, pa abah __LB__pa cho, pa palo, pa huyub, pa __LB__tacah. quiꜩih vi chi eloeolah __LB__vinac ri balam quiꜩe, Balam__PC__ __LB__acab, mahucutah, iquibalam.

__LB__Ta xeꜩonox cut rumal ri __LB__ahꜩac ahbit huchalic iqohei __LB__quinao maqui xmucunic ma __LB__quixtaonic, ma vꜩ ichabal ruq __LB__ibinibal quixmucuna na cut __LB__chiuila vxecah maealah hu__PC__ __LB__yub tacah quivilo chitiha na __LB__cut xevqhaxic cate puch xqu__PC__ __LB__iz quil ronohel vxe cah cate __LB__cut qui camouanic ri chire __LB__ꜩacol bitol quiꜩih vi chi cam__PC__ __LB__ul camo oxmul camo mi xohvi__PC__ __LB__naquiric mi pu xohchiinic, xoh __LB__vachinic cohqhauic, cohtaonic __LB__cohbizonic cohzilabic vꜩ caca__PC__ __LB__nao xquetamah nah nacah mi__PC__ __LB__pu xquilo nim chutin vpa cah __LB__vpa vleu camo cut chive mi__PC__ __LB__xohvinaquiric ohꜩac, oh bit mi__PC__ __LB__xohvxic at catit, at camam xe __LB__qha taxquicamouah quiꜩaquic __LB__quibitic. xquiz quetamah rono__PC__ __LB__hel xquimucuh cah ꜩuc cah xu __LB__cut vpam cah vpam vleu ma__PC__ __LB__cuvꜩ xquitao riahꜩac ahbit __LB__mavi vꜩ ri mixquibÿh caꜩac ca __LB__bit mixquetamah ronohel nim — 34r — __LB__chutin queqha.

__LB__Quehe chicut vcamic chic __LB__qui naoh alom qaholom hucha __LB__chic chicaban chique xata nacah __LB__chopon vi qui mucubal xatazca__PC__ __LB__quin v vach vvach vleu chiqui __LB__lo mavi vꜩ ri caquibÿh mapa __LB__xaꜩac xabit quibi xalabe eca__PC__ __LB__bauil quevxi chic vve maui __LB__quepocotahic quequiritahic ta __LB__chauaxoc ta zaquiroc vve ma__PC__ __LB__vi chiquiiaric ta chuxoc? xa cayo__PC__ __LB__ho chi zcaquin chic qo chi carah __LB__mavi vꜩ cacanao. xapa xchihu__PC__ __LB__namatah quibanoh cuq ri naht __LB__copon vi quetamabl quilon ro__PC__ __LB__nohel xevqhaxic rumal vqux __LB__cah huracan, chipicaculha, raxa__PC__ __LB__caculha tepeu cucumaꜩ alom __LB__qaholom, xpiyacoc, xmucane ꜩa__PC__ __LB__col bitol quevqhaxic ta xquiban __LB__cut vqoheic chic quiꜩac qui bit

vchabaha, ah chu__PC__ __LB__mila ha ruq ahquibaha, ah batenaba __LB__acul vinac balamiha canchahe leb__PC__ __LB__balam colob. xere cut vnimaquil __LB__amac ri vca amac qohqha chirech vleu __LB__xeqha xere qui quxlaan ri re __LB__vaxic vzaquiric. xaꜩononic chi__PC__ __LB__quibano e ahloe ꜩihe ahloe eah__PC__ __LB__nim, e ahxob chiquipacaba qui__PC__ __LB__vach chicah ta chiqui ꜩonoh qui __LB__meal qui qahol acaroc at ꜩacol __LB__at bitol cohauila, cohata moha __LB__zaco, mohapizcalih at cabauil __LB__chicah chivleuh vqux cah v __LB__quxvleu chatah quetal caꜩihol __LB__chi be quih chi be zac ta chauaxoc __LB__ta zaquiroc quita raxalbe raxal __LB__hoc cohaya vi lianic zaclianic a __LB__mac tah vꜩilah zac, vꜩilah amac __LB__tah, vꜩilah qazlem, vinaquirem __LB__ta puch cohaia vi at huracan __LB__chipa caculha, raxa caculha __LB__chipina navac raxa nana vac __LB__voc hunahpu tepeu cucumaꜩ __LB__alom qaholom xpiyacoc, xmu__PC__ __LB__cane ratit quih ratit zac tacha__PC__ __LB__uaxoc, ta zaquiroc. xeqha ta xe__PC__ __LB__quilonic xeziquinic xazelava__PC__ __LB__chin vzaquiric xavi chila que__PC__ __LB__mucun vi relebal quih quila va__PC__ __LB__chin ri iqoquih nima chu mil xa __LB__chalaxic quih ꜩihol re vpa cah __LB__vpavleu vbinibal vinac ꜩac vi __LB__nac bit xeqha e balam quiꜩe __LB__balam acab, mahucutah, iqui__PC__ __LB__balam coyobeh na vzaquiric __LB__xeqha e nimac etamanel enao__PC__ __LB__nel e ahquixb, e ah nim quevqha __LB__xic mahabi cuhabioc che abah __LB__chichahin e canabe chuch cahau. __LB__e xacu xcoz qui qux chiri chiro __LB__yobexic quih e quÿ chic rono__PC__ __LB__hel amac ruq ya qui vinac ah ✎__LB__quix ahcab xaho oh caꜩu cuhoh__PC__ — 35v — 35 ✎✎__LB__pu quila ve qo chi chahin quetala __LB__chicaric ri cohꜩihon ta chuvach __LB__xaqui quehe oh qolic mahabi __LB__chahal que xeqha cut e balam __LB__quiꜩe, balam acab, mahucutah __LB__iqui balam xquitao vꜩihol hun __LB__tinamit xebevi

__LB__Arecut vbi huyub va xebe vi __LB__Balam quiꜩe, Balam acab mahu __LB__cutah, iqui balam ruq tumub, ilo__PC__ __LB__cab, tulanzuiva vvcub pec, vv__PC__ __LB__cubzivan vbi tinamit xeopon vi __LB__e camolre cabauil

__LB__Xeopon cut chila tulan conoh__PC__ __LB__el maui ahilan chivinac xoponic __LB__ꜩaꜩcut chubinic cholon cut relic __LB__vloc qui cabavil nabe ri balam __LB__quiꜩe, Balam acaab, mahucutah __LB__iqui balam quequicotic are ca ꜩu __LB__cum va mi xcarico xeqha are __LB__cut nabe xel ri tohil vbicaba__PC__ __LB__uil . xequel vcoc ri caxic rumal __LB__balam quiꜩe. xel chicu vloc avi__PC__ __LB__lix vbi cabauil xrucah Balam __LB__acabal hacauiꜩ chic vbi caba __LB__vil xucamo Mahucutah. nica__PC__ __LB__cahtacah vbi cabavil xucamo i__PC__ __LB__qui Balam. xere cut rach queche __LB__vinac ri xucaam chicut reta__PC__ __LB__mub xaui xere tohil chitamub __LB__qo vbi xcamouic vmam vcaha__PC__ __LB__u tamub ahauab quetaan cut __LB__vacamic, roxchicut ilocab xa__PC__ __LB__ui tohil vbi cabavil xucamo __LB__quimam quicahau ahauab xa __LB__ui quetaam va camic

__LB__Quehecut vbinaam vi ox__PC__ __LB__ib chiquiche xma xuꜩocopih __LB__virib rumal xa hunam vbi ca__PC__ __LB__bauil tohil quiche, tohil chi ta__PC__ __LB__mub, chi ilocab xa hun vbi v __LB__cabavil que cu mavi xuhach __LB__vi rib roxichal queche oxib __LB__ri quiꜩih nimac qui qoheic to __LB__hilauilix hacaviꜩ ta xoc chicut __LB__ronohel amac rabinaleb, ca__PC__ ✎✎__LB__echequeleb, ahq,iquina ha, ruq — 36r — __LB__yaquivinac vbi vacamic. chiri __LB__cut xhalcatih v qhabal ri a__PC__ __LB__mac halahoh qui qhabal xuxic __LB__maui calah chic xquitao chi qui__PC__ __LB__bilquib ta xepetic chitulan chi__PC__ __LB__ri cut xquipaxih vi quib qo __LB__xbechila relebal quih, ꜩaꜩ cu __LB__ri xpe varal. xa cuha mahꜩu__PC__ __LB__um quicu, mahabi ri vꜩilah __LB__tac cul tah quicohom xa v ‘q,u__PC__ __LB__mal chicop qui cauvbal eme__PC__ __LB__ba mahabi quech xa enaual __LB__vinac chiquiqoheic. taxepe chi__PC__ __LB__la tulan zu va vvcub pec vvcub __LB__zivan qha chupan oher ꜩih ꜩaꜩ __LB__chubinic xopon chitulan macu __LB__habi eae xaqui e co ri tohil are __LB__curi vcabauil amac nabe xvi__PC__ __LB__naquir veae maui calah vvina __LB__quiric canicou chic qui eae ta __LB__xquil ri Balam quiꜩe Balam a __LB__cab acaroc mahabi ca eae mi__PC__ __LB__xuxic xcohcam rumal tu xe __LB__qha cut ta xqhau cut ritohil __LB__mixbizonic qoivech chizach ri + quibiih. __LB__eae+ xqha cut tohil chi__PC__ __LB__que. ma quiꜩih at cabauil at __LB__caꜩucuh at pu ca coon at ca__PC__ __LB__cabauil xeqha chire ta xquica__PC__ __LB__movah ri xubÿh tohil. uꜩbala __LB__quiꜩih in icabauil ta chuxoc in __LB__ivahaual ta chuxoc xevqhax __LB__ri ahquixb ahcah rumal to__PC__ __LB__hil arecut queeaeal ria __LB__mac quequicotic rumal qui __LB__eae

__LB__Catepuch ta xticaric nima hab __LB__are catilo veae amac ꜩaꜩ cut __LB__chi zacboch xachic pa qui vi ro __LB__nohel amac ta xchup cut qui __LB__eae rumal zacboch mahabi __LB__chic quieae xuxic. __LB__Taxevl puch chiri chuvi hun __LB__huyub chiri xquicuch vi quib __LB__conohel queche vinac ruq a __LB__mac chiriqu xepopon vi co__PC__ __LB__nohel ta xquipixabah quib __LB__vbinaam huyub vacamic chi__PC__ __LB__pixab vbihuyub. xe cuchu vi __LB__quib chiri cut xquicobizah vi __LB__quib. inva inqueche vinac, at __LB__curi at tamub, are abi chuxic __LB__xu qhax ri tamub. xqha chicut __LB__ilocab at ilocab are abi richu__PC__ __LB__xic maui zachel oxib chi quiche __LB__xahunam caꜩih xeqhacut __LB__ta xcoh quibi

__LB__Ta xbinaah chicuri eaeche__PC__ __LB__queleb. eaechequeleb vbi xuxic __LB__ruc chic rabinaleb are chicu __LB__vbi xuxic maui zachinac vaca__PC__ __LB__mic are chicuri ah q,iquina ha __LB__vbi vacamic are cu qui bi ri x__PC__ __LB__quibÿh quichiquibil quib. chiri __LB__na xe poponvi xa chicoyobehna __LB__vzaquiric chiquila vachih relic — 38v — __LB__vlachumil are nabe chuvach quih __LB__ta chalaxoc chila xohpe vi xa xoh __LB__paxin quib xecha chi quibil quib __LB__are chicatatat vi qui qux ri ni __LB__ma caxcol xe icou vi vloc maha __LB__bi va mahabi echa xa vxe qui cha __LB__mi chiquizico queheri quevaic __LB__chiquinao xma queva vi ta xe __LB__petic macu calah qui i couic __LB__vloc pa palo queheri maha__PC__ __LB__bi palo xeicouvi vloc xa __LB__chuvi tac abah xeicou vi vloc __LB__colehe vla ri abah puzanaieb __LB__ta xquibinatizah cut cholochic __LB__abah bocotahinac zanaieb v __LB__bi cumal ri xeicou vi vloc chu __LB__pan palo vhachon rib ha xeicou __LB__vi vloc are cut chitat1 vi quiqux __LB__ta xe pixaban quib chi mahabi __LB__qui va hu vc chiquicumeh ri xa __LB__hunai xim chiri cut ecaal vi ch__PC__ __LB__uvihuiub chipixab vbi. xauica __LB__cucaam ri tohil auilix hacaviꜩ. __LB__nima meuahic caquiban ri ba__PC__ __LB__lam quiꜩe ruq rixoquil eaha__PC__ __LB__paluna vbi rixoquil. xavi que__PC__ __LB__he cubano balam acab ruq ri __LB__xoquil chomiha vbi. ruq chic ma __LB__hucutah nima meuahic qovi __LB__ruq rixoquil ꜩununiha vbi. __LB__ruq iquibalam caquixha vbi __LB__rixoquil are cut e ah meva ri __LB__chique cumal chiaeabal nim __LB__qui biz taxe qoheic chuvi huyub __LB__chipixab vbi vacamic xqha __LB__chi cut qui cabauil chiri.

__LB__Ta xqha cut ruq tohil au__PC__ __LB__lix hacaviꜩ chiquech ri Ba__PC__ __LB__lam quiꜩe, balam acab, mahu__PC__ __LB__cutah, iqui balam, xata coh bec __LB__xata pu cohyacatahic mata va__PC__ __LB__vzaquiric. are cut ecucuxinac __LB__vi ri cabauil patac zivan pa __LB__tac quechelah xa pa ec xa pa __LB__aꜩiiac eqovi mana paꜩalam __LB__tah xeya vi queqhau nabec ri __LB__tohil avilix hacaviꜩ __LB__xe zaquir vi camam cacahauva __LB__chi cabÿh chic vzaquiric vva__PC__ — 40r — __LB__chinic puch quih, ic, qhumil

__LB__Vae cute vzaquiric vvachi__PC__ __LB__nic puch quih, ic, qhumil.

__LB__Nim cut xe quicotic balam __LB__quiꜩe, balam acab, mahucutah, __LB__iqui balam ta xril ri icoquih. na __LB__be xel vloc chitiltotic vvach __LB__ta xel vloc nabe cut chuvach __LB__quih cate cut ta xqui quir qui __LB__pom chila petenac vi relebal __LB__quih cate vchac chiquiqux ta __LB__xquiquiroc oxichal quicamo__PC__ __LB__vabal chi qui qux. mi xtam __LB__pom vbi pom rucaam balam __LB__quiꜩe. cavizton pom chicv__PC__ __LB__bi pom rucaam balam acab. __LB__cabavil pom chuqhaxic chic __LB__rucam mahucutah. e oxibqo __LB__qui pom are cut xquicato __LB__ta xe zacbizani aponoc chila __LB__relebal quih quz queoquic __LB__taxezacbizanic x quicat qui__PC__ __LB__pom loꜫalah pom cate cut x__PC__ __LB__coqueh ri maui xquilo ma__PC__ __LB__pu xquivachih ralaxic quih __LB__cate puch ta xel vlo quih xquicotic __LB__chuti chicop nima chicop xquiz ya__PC__ __LB__catah vloc pabeya pazivan xe __LB__qoheic ꜩam tachuyub, xahun xqui__PC__ __LB__xevi qui vach chila xelvi vloc __LB__quih, cate ta xeoquic coh balam __LB__nabe cut xoc ri q,iquin quele __LB__ꜩu vbi. quiꜩih chi xquicot rono__PC__ __LB__hel chicop xquirip qui xic, cot __LB__zaccuch chuti q,iquin nima q,iquin. __LB__e cu xucuxuxinac ri ah quixb, __LB__ah cahb nim quequicotic ruq rah __LB__quixb, rahcahb tamub ilocab ruq __LB__rabinaleb ꜫaꜫchequeleb, ahq,I__PC__ __LB__quinaha ruq tuhalha vchaba__PC__ __LB__ha, quibaha, __LB__Cate puch xebec xecauuxic qui__PC__ __LB__bec chila chatin vi tohil quicari__PC__ __LB__loon curi qui chahon ta xebec. que __LB__quicot chicuri ahauab cumal ri __LB__e caib qui mial xquitac vbic. ta __LB__xeopon cut chiya cate xquiti__PC__ __LB__quiba chahonic xquiꜩonoba quib __LB__qui cabichal e chacachaxinac __LB__chuvach tac abah, ta xe culun __LB__curi tohil aulix hacaviꜩ. xeopon __LB__chila chuchi ya, xa cu zcaquin __LB__xrocoibeh qui vach ri e caib ca__PC__ __LB__pohib quechahonic nare curi __LB__capohib xa huzu xequixbic __LB__ta xeopon ri tohil macuhabi __LB__xbe qui raibal ri tohil chirech __LB__ri e caib capohib ta xeꜩonox __LB__cut apa quixpe vi. xevqhaxic __LB__chirech, ri e caib capohib xev__PC__ __LB__qhaxic naquipa quivah quixul __LB__varal chu chi vi ca a xevqhax __LB__cut ohba tacon vloc cumal __LB__ahauab ta xohpetic chibe ivila __LB__cuivach ri tohil quixqhau cuq __LB__xeqha ahauab chique quehe __LB__cut chipe vi retal quiꜩih vve __LB__chivil qui vach xohohvqhaxic __LB__xeqha curi e caib capohib ta xqui__PC__ __LB__zucuba qui taquiquil areta cu __LB__xcah ri amac xehox ta ri capo__PC__ __LB__hib rumal qui naual tohil xe __LB__qha curi tohil aulix hacaviꜩ

— 44v — __LB__ta xeqhau chic chiquech ri xtah __LB__xpuch quibi re e caib capohib __LB__vꜩ chibec retal caꜩihivvq chi__PC__ __LB__uoyobeh na chiya apanoc chi__PC__ __LB__quech ahauab xevqhax cut ca__PC__ __LB__te puch qui naohinic chic ri ah __LB__quixb, ahcahb xevqhax ri balam __LB__quiꜩe, balam acab, mahucutah, __LB__iqui balam quixzibanoc oxib __LB__cul chiꜩibah retal iqoheic cho__PC__ __LB__pon cuq amac chibe cuq re e caib __LB__capohib quechahonic chi ya vbic __LB__chique xevqhax cut balam qui__PC__ __LB__ꜩe, balam acab, mahucutah.

__LB__Cate cut xezibanic coxichal na__PC__ __LB__be xꜩiban ri balam quiꜩe. balam __LB__vvachibal xuxic xuꜩibah chu__PC__ __LB__vach cul. are curi chi balam acab, __LB__cot chic vvachibal xuꜩibah __LB__mizanel arecut e qo ri balam __LB__quiꜩe balam acab mahucutah — 45v — __LB__iquibalam are e qo chuvi huyub __LB__hacaviꜩ vbi huyub eqovi xqo__PC__ __LB__lo cut quiqahol chiri chuvi __LB__huyub conohel xepoponic __LB__xeta co quib conohel.

__LB__Ta xeopon cut chuvach ahau __LB__nacxit vbi nim ahau xahu __LB__catol ꜩih ꜩaꜩ rahauarem are __LB__cut xyau vloc retal ahauarem __LB__ronohel vvachinel ta xpetic re __LB__tal ahpopol, ahpop camhail ta __LB__xpe cut retal veaeal rahaua__PC__ __LB__rem puch ahpop ahpop camha __LB__xquiz vya vloc nacxit vvachi__PC__ __LB__nel rahauarem aretac vbi va __LB__muh ealibah zubac chamcham __LB__tatil canabah ꜩicvil cohꜩicuil __LB__balam holom pich queh macu__PC__ __LB__tax tot tatam quz buz caxcon __LB__chiyom aztapulul ronohel cu __LB__quecaam ri xepetic taxquica__PC__ __LB__vlari chaca palo vꜩibal tulan __LB__vꜩibal xeqha chire qui oqui__PC__ __LB__nac chupan chupan quiꜩih.

__LB__Catepuch taxeyacatah chivl __LB__oc xevlchiri patinamit cumarca__PC__ __LB__ah vbi cumal quiche chuqha xic __LB__taxevl chic ahauab cotuha ruq __LB__cucumaꜩ ruq puchronohel aha__PC__ __LB__uab xroquexoc xroleapuch vi__PC__ + Vxe am __LB__ac __LB__+ Vínaquí- __LB__xem __LB__nac vxe zac vxe qazlem chiri1 __LB__cut qui xquiban vi cuchoch __LB__chiri naipuch xquiban vi roch__PC__ __LB__och cabauil chu nicahal vvi __LB__tinamit xquiy avi taxevlic ta __LB__xquitiquilibeh puch catepuch __LB__vnimaric chic cahauarem e qui __LB__chic epuꜩaꜩ chic ta xquinao__PC__ __LB__hih chic quiniha xemoloxic xe __LB__ha chahox puch rumal xvinaquir __LB__quix quichaoh xeꜫacvachin __LB__chiquib chuvi rahil canab ra __LB__hil quimial rumal xa maui chi__PC__ __LB__ꜩacon cuquia chiquivach are +ꜩalbehq-__LB__uíb__LB__+cacbeh __LB__chicut vxe chic quihachouic __LB__quib ta xqui ꜩol bac vholom ca __LB__minac xquicacbeh quib taxqui __LB__pax ri beletacl chi chinamit x__PC__ __LB__banom oc vqhaohil anam mial __LB__taxban vnaohixic ahauarem __LB__huvinac cahib chinim ha xuxic __LB__xoheroc quevlic conohel chiri __LB__chuvi qui tinamit ta xe ꜩacat hu__PC__ __LB__vinac coahib nimha chiri pa __LB__tinamit cumarcaah xuꜩirizaxic — 51r — __LB__rumal Sor. obispo ri +ca xtole can +tinamit __LB__oc. xeeaear chiri xnuc maihi__PC__ __LB__nac oc qui tem qui chacat xha __LB__chaꜩox qui vach hu tac vi chi __LB__eae huhun chi ahauab beleheb __LB__tac chi chinamit xucolela rib be__PC__ __LB__leheb chiahauab belehe tac chi __LB__chinamit xucola rib beleheb __LB__chi ahauab chi ahauab caviquib. __LB__beleheb chiahauab nihaibab. __LB__cahichiahauab. ahau quiche+ +caibchi' __LB__ahau zaqui-__LB__quib. __LB__quia tac xuxic qui chinai puch __LB__chirih huhun ahauab. xavnabe __LB__ri qochivi ralvqahol. ꜩaꜩ ꜩaꜩ v __LB__chinamital huhun chiahauab chi __LB__cabÿh quibi riahauab chuhu__PC__ __LB__hunal huhun vnim ha.

__LB__Vae cute quibi ahauab chu __LB__vach caui quib are nabe ahau __LB__va, ahpop ahpop camha, ah to__PC__ __LB__hil, ah cueumaꜩ, nim chocoh ca __LB__vec, popol vinac, chituy lolmet, __LB__queh nay. popol vinac, pahom __LB__ꜩalaꜩ, vchuch cam ha.

__LB__Are cut ahauab ri chuvach __LB__caviquib beleheb chi ahauab __LB__colehe vnimha chuhuhunal ca __LB__te chic chivachin v vach.

__LB__Are chicu ahavab va chu __LB__vach nihaibab are nabe aha__PC__ __LB__u va ahau ealel, ahau ahꜩic vi__PC__ __LB__nac, cale camha, nima camha, v __LB__chuch camha, nimchocoh nihaib__PC__ __LB__ab, aulix, yacolatam, vꜩam pop __LB__zaclatol, nima lolmet yeoltux. __LB__beleheb cut chi ahauab chuva__PC__ __LB__ch nihaibab

__LB__Are chicut ahau quiche va __LB__vae quibi ahauab. ahꜩic vinac __LB__ahau lolmet, ahau nim chocoh __LB__ahau, ahau hacaviꜩ. cahib a__PC__ __LB__hauab chuvach ahau quiche__PC__ __LB__eb colehe vnim ha.

__LB__Caib chinamit chi na ipuch __LB__ca quiquib auhaab ꜩutuhay ealel __LB__'zaquic xahun chi nim ha ecaib __LB__chiahauab.

__LB__Vae cute vleel, vtazel aha__PC__ __LB__uarem chi ronohel quizaquiri__PC__ __LB__hem balam quiꜩe, balam acab __LB__mahucutah iquibalam. nabe ca __LB__mam nabe ca cahau. ta xvachin __LB__quih xvachin ic, qhumil. vaecute __LB__vleel vtazel ahauarem xchica __LB__tiquiba vl oc qui chuxe culucuh __LB__chi roquic ahauab ta choquic ta __LB__chi camiheic hutac le chi ahauab __LB__ri mama ruq rahaual chitina__PC__ __LB__mit ronohel chi huhun chi aha__PC__ __LB__uab vae cute xchivachin vvach __LB__chuhuhunal ahauabva. __LB__cate xchivachin vvach huhun chuhu__PC__ __LB__hunal ahauab quiche
